    mastodon.at (preview)

    | Users: 1,869 | Toots: 104,627 | Connections: 1,084 |

    mastodon.at is open to all users and federates with most instances.

    🇩🇪 🇦🇹 🇨🇭 mastodon.at ist offen für alle User und ist mit vielen anderen Instanzen verbunden.

    (more)Welcome to mastodon.at! This instance is open to all users and federates with all other instances with the exception of those with community values that are overwhelmingly incompatible with our Terms of Service below. Please read the section Responsibility of Contributors below and report any content that you feel might be inappropriate. Follow @Support for important updates!

    🇩🇪 🇦🇹 🇨🇭 Willkommen auf mastodon.at! Diese Instanz ist offen für alle User und ist mit allen anderen Instanzen verbunden, mit der Ausnahme jener, deren Werte mit unseren Nutzungsbedingungen (siehe unten) überwiegend inkompatibel sind. 🇩🇪 🇦🇹 🇨🇭 Bitte lies den Punkt Responsibility of Contributors unten genau durch und melde Inhalte, die du für unangebracht hältst. Folge @Support für wichtige Updates!

    Terms of Service: The following terms and conditions govern all use of the mastodon.at website and all content, services, and products available at or through the website. Our Services are offered subject to your acceptance without modification of all of the terms and conditions contained herein and all other operating rules, policies (including, without limitation, the Privacy Policy) and procedures that may be published from time to time by mastodon.at (collectively, the “Agreement”). You agree that we may automatically upgrade our Services, and these terms will apply to any upgrades. Please read this Agreement carefully before accessing or using our Services. By accessing or using any part of our services, you agree to become bound by the terms and conditions of this agreement. If you do not agree to all the terms and conditions of this agreement, then you may not access or use any of our services. If these terms and conditions are considered an offer by mastodon.at, acceptance is expressly limited to these terms. Use of our Services requires a mastodon.at account. You will be solely responsible and liable for any activity that occurs under your username. You are responsible for keeping your password secure. 1. Your mastodon.at Account If you create an account on mastodon.at, you are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and blog, and you are fully responsible for all activities that occur under the account and any other actions taken in connection with your account. You must immediately notify mastodon.at of any unauthorized uses of your account or any other breaches of security. mastodon.at will not be liable for any acts or omissions by you, including any damages of any kind incurred as a result of such acts or omissions. 2. Responsibility of Contributors If you post material to mastodon.at, post links on mastodon.at, or otherwise make (or allow any third party to make) material available (any such material, “Content”), you are entirely responsible for the content of, and any harm resulting from, that Content or your conduct. That is the case regardless of what form the Content takes, which includes, but is not limited to text, photo, video, audio, or code. By using mastodon.at, you represent and warrant that your Content and conduct do not violate the following terms:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism Sexism or advocation of sexism Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children Content illegal in Austria and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person’s demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    If you delete Content, mastodon.at will use reasonable efforts to remove it from mastodon.at, but you acknowledge that caching or references to the Content may not be made immediately unavailable. Without limiting any of those representations or warranties, mastodon.at has the right (though not the obligation) to, in mastodon.at’s sole discretion, (i) reclaim your username or website’s URL due to prolonged inactivity, (ii) refuse or remove any content that, in mastodon.at’s reasonable opinion, violates any mastodon.at policy or is in any way harmful or objectionable, or (iii) terminate or deny access to and use of mastodon.at to any individual or entity for any reason. 3. Responsibility of Visitors. mastodon.at has not reviewed, and cannot review, all of the material, including computer software, posted to our Services, and cannot therefore be responsible for that material’s content, use or effects. By operating our Services, mastodon.at does not represent or imply that it endorses the material there posted, or that it believes such material to be accurate, useful, or non-harmful. You are responsible for taking precautions as necessary to protect yourself and your computer systems from viruses, worms, Trojan horses, and other harmful or destructive content. Our Services may contain content that is offensive, indecent, or otherwise objectionable, as well as content containing technical inaccuracies, typographical mistakes, and other errors. Our Services may also contain material that violates the privacy or publicity rights, or infringes the intellectual property and other proprietary rights, of third parties, or the downloading, copying or use of which is subject to additional terms and conditions, stated or unstated. mastodon.at disclaims any responsibility for any harm resulting from the use by visitors of our Services, or from any downloading by those visitors of content there posted. You’re encouraged to report any content that you feel is inappropriate or in violation of these terms. 4. Content Posted on Other Websites. We have not reviewed, and cannot review, all of the material, including computer software, made available through the websites and webpages to which mastodon.at links, and that link to mastodon.at. mastodon.at does not have any control over those non-mastodon.at websites, and is not responsible for their contents or their use. By linking to a non-mastodon.at website, mastodon.at does not represent or imply that it endorses such website. You are responsible for taking precautions as necessary to protect yourself and your computer systems from viruses, worms, Trojan horses, and other harmful or destructive content. mastodon.at disclaims any responsibility for any harm resulting from your use of non-mastodon.at websites and webpages. 5. Changes. We are constantly updating our Services, and that means sometimes we have to change the legal terms under which our Services are offered. If we make changes that are material, we will let you know by posting on one of our admin accounts, or by sending you an email or other communication before the changes take effect. The notice will designate a reasonable period of time after which the new terms will take effect. If you disagree with our changes, then you should stop using our Services within the designated notice period. Your continued use of our Services will be subject to the new terms. However, any dispute that arose before the changes shall be governed by the Terms (including the binding individual arbitration clause) that were in place when the dispute arose. 6. Termination. mastodon.at may terminate your access to all or any part of our Services at any time, with or without cause, with or without notice, effective immediately. If you wish to terminate this Agreement or your mastodon.at account (if you have one), you may simply discontinue using our Services. All provisions of this Agreement which by their nature should survive termination shall survive termination, including, without limitation, ownership provisions, warranty disclaimers, indemnity and limitations of liability.  7. Disclaimer of Warranties. Our Services are provided “as is.” mastodon.at and its suppliers and licensors hereby disclaim all warranties of any kind, express or implied, including, without limitation, the warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose and non-infringement. Neither mastodon.at nor its suppliers and licensors, makes any warranty that our Services will be error free or that access thereto will be continuous or uninterrupted. You understand that you download from, or otherwise obtain content or services through, our Services at your own discretion and risk. 8. Limitation of Liability. In no event will mastodon.at, or its suppliers or licensors, be liable with respect to any subject matter of this Agreement under any contract, negligence, strict liability or other legal or equitable theory for: (i) any special, incidental or consequential damages; (ii) the cost of procurement for substitute products or services; (iii) for interruption of use or loss or corruption of data; or (iv) for any amounts that exceed the fees paid by you to mastodon.at under this agreement during the twelve (12) month period prior to the cause of action. mastodon.at shall have no liability for any failure or delay due to matters beyond their reasonable control. The foregoing shall not apply to the extent prohibited by applicable law. 9. General Representation and Warranty. You represent and warrant that (i) your use of our Services will be in strict accordance with the mastodon.at Privacy Policy, with this Agreement, and with all applicable laws and regulations (including without limitation any local laws or regulations in your country, state, city, or other governmental area, regarding online conduct and acceptable content, and including all applicable laws regarding the transmission of technical data exported from Austria or the country in which you reside) and (ii) your use of our Services will not infringe or misappropriate the intellectual property rights of any third party. Adapted from WordPress.com Terms of Service and the mastodon.social content guidelines. WordPress.com Terms of Service available under the Creative Commons Sharealike license.

    Email: patrick@figel.email

    Admin: @pfigel@mastodon.at

    lovethe.wang (preview)

    | Users: 7 | Toots: 68 | Connections: 176 |

    Do you love the wang?

    We’re pretty lewd here, be warned.

    (more)We’re pretty lewd here, be warned.

    Site rules: Interaction with the community.

    Remember, people will never forget how you made them feel. Tag content that people may not want to see using the content warning function. Harassment and bullying of any kind will not be tolerated and will lead to a full suspension.

    Content

    Content illegal in the United Kingdom, France or the Netherlands is prohibited and will lead to a full suspension. Transphobic, homo/biphobic, racist, etc content is prohibited and will lead to a full suspension. Spam is prohibited. Bots are allowed but must not interact with users without being explicitly requested to.

    Network Please be aware that due to the nature of federated platforms, we have very little control over the behaviors of users from other communities.

    Use the standard mute and block functions where needed.

    However, please report users that offend the CoC of this instance and the administration will take action if necessary.

    Admin decisions are final and are not up for discussion. The rules set out above are guidelines for acceptable content/behavior and may be changed any time without notice.

    Please note the administration may take action in cases outside of the rules for the greater need of the community/federation at large.

    Suspended and silenced instances

    pawoo.net (Suspended) noagendasocial.com (Silenced)

    Email: kaylee@lovethe.wang

    Admin: @kaylee@lovethe.wang

    burners.social (preview)

    | Users: 137 | Toots: 293 | Connections: 315 |

    An online community for burners and the people that love them )‘( 🔥

    (more) Radical Inclusion Anyone may be a part of Burners.social. We welcome and respect the stranger. No prerequisites exist for participation in our community.

    Gifting Burners.social is devoted to acts of gift giving. The value of a gift is unconditional. Gifting does not contemplate a return or an exchange for something of equal value.

    Decommodification In order to preserve the spirit of gifting, our community seeks to create social environments that are unmediated by commercial sponsorships, transactions, or advertising. We stand ready to protect our culture from such exploitation. We resist the substitution of consumption for participatory experience.

    Radical Self-reliance Burners.social encourages the individual to discover, exercise and rely on his or her inner resources.

    Radical Self-expression Radical self-expression arises from the unique gifts of the individual. No one other than the individual or a collaborating group can determine its content. It is offered as a gift to others. In this spirit, the giver should respect the rights and liberties of the recipient.

    Communal Effort Our community values creative cooperation and collaboration. We strive to produce, promote and protect social networks, public spaces, works of art, and methods of communication that support such interaction.

    Civic Responsibility We value civil society. Community members who organize events should assume responsibility for public welfare and endeavor to communicate civic responsibilities to participants. They must also assume responsibility for conducting events in accordance with local, state and federal laws.

    Leaving No Trace Our community respects the environment. We are committed to leaving no physical trace of our activities wherever we gather. We clean up after ourselves and endeavor, whenever possible, to leave such places in a better state than when we found them.

    Participation Our community is committed to a radically participatory ethic. We believe that transformative change, whether in the individual or in society, can occur only through the medium of deeply personal participation. We achieve being through doing. Everyone is invited to work. Everyone is invited to play. We make the world real through actions that open the heart.

    Immediacy Immediate experience is, in many ways, the most important touchstone of value in our culture. We seek to overcome barriers that stand between us and a recognition of our inner selves, the reality of those around us, participation in society, and contact with a natural world exceeding human powers. No idea can substitute for this experience.

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @muloka@burners.social

    super-famicom.com (preview)

    ここはファミコン・スーファミの話題を楽しめる場として立てられた マストドンのインスタンスです。　任天堂のファミコンや、スーパーファミコン関連のトゥート(発言）が５０％、雑談が５０％くらいの心持ちでどなたにも使っていただけます！

    (more)【禁止行為】 ・公序良俗に反する行為 ・日本国内の法律に違反する行為 ・他者に中傷・脅迫・経済的もしくは精神的に損害や不利益を与える行為 ・実在の人物・団体などになりすます行為 ・他者の著作物を無断転載する行為 ・サーバに極端な負荷をかける行為 ・インスタンスのテーマと関係のない発言ばかりを積極的に連続的に行う

    wandering.shop (preview)

    | Users: 175 | Toots: 9,127 | Connections: 417 |

    The Wandering Shop is a Mastodon instance for the science fiction and fantasy community. We want our ‘local’ timeline to have the feel of a coffee shop at a good science fiction convention: tables full of friendly conversation on a wide variety of topics. We welcome everyone who wants to participate, so long as you’re willing to abide by our code of conduct.

    Code of Conduct

    We want this to be a fun, pleasant, and harassment-free experience for everyone. By joining the Wandering Shop, you’re agreeing to abide by our code of conduct.

    (more)The Wandering Shop Code of Conduct Welcome! The Wandering Shop is a Mastodon instance for the science fiction and fantasy community. We want our ‘local’ timeline to have the feel of a coffee shop at a good science fiction convention: tables full of friendly conversation on a wide variety of topics. We want this to be a fun, pleasant, and harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, or religion. We do not tolerate harassment of participants in any form. Participants asked to stop any harassing behavior are expected to comply immediately. If someone asks you to leave them alone, leave them alone. Unacceptable Behavior The following behavior is not welcome anywhere in The Wandering Shop:

    Offensive comments related to gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, mental illness, neuro(a)typicality, physical appearance, body size, race, or religion. Holocaust denial and Nazi symbolism. Deliberate or persistent misgendering. Threats of violence. Incitement of violence towards any individual, including encouraging a person to commit suicide or to engage in self-harm. Deliberate intimidation. Publishing any individual’s address, phone number, or other private identifying information without consent. Sexual depictions of children. Unwelcome sexual attention, including sharing sexual content with specific users without consent. Gratuitous sexual images or behavior without a content warning. Simulated physical contact (e.g. textual descriptions like “hug” or “backrub”) without consent or after a request to stop. Publication of non-harassing private communication without consent. Sustained disruption of discussion. Continued communications with someone who’s asked that you leave them alone. Unwelcome comments regarding a person’s lifestyle choices and practices, including those related to food, health, parenting, drugs, and employment.

    The following behavior is not allowed on the public timeline:

    Graphic violent or sexual content without a content warning Gratuitous advertizing or spam. It’s fine to promote your work, but it shouldn’t be the bulk of what you share.

    Known Harassers: The admins may ban or silence users whom we know to be harassers or abusers, even if they have not violated the rules of this instance. The mere presence of a harasser can make past or potential victims uncomfortable, and it can put potential victims who are unaware of the person’s history in particular danger. Users are encouraged to individually mute, block, and/or report accounts they don’t want to see, but at our discretion, we may take the additional step of blocking or silencing someone instance-wide if we believe they endanger the safe and welcoming space we’re trying to maintain. Reporting The current admins are:

    Annalee Phildini If you are being harassed, notice that someone else is being harassed, or have any other concerns, please contact the admins. They’ll respond as promptly as they can. We will respect confidentiality requests for the purpose of protecting victims of abuse. At our discretion, we may publicly name a person about whom we’ve received harassment complaints, or privately warn third parties about them. We will not name harassment victims without their affirmative consent. Consequences Participants asked to stop any harassing behavior are expected to comply immediately. If a participant engages in harassing behavior, the admins may take any action they deem appropriate, up to and including expulsion from the wandering shop and identifying the participant publicly as someone about whom we’ve received complaints. Credits and License This code of conduct is based on Annalee Flower Horne’s Sample Slack Code of Conduct, which is in turn based on Geek Feminism’s Community Anti-Harassment Policy.

    Email: phildini@phildini.net

    Admin: @phildini@wandering.shop

    kirby-fans.com (preview)

    | Users: 54 | Toots: 607 | Connections: 36 |

    「星のカービィのファンからなるコミュニティ」を目指してインスタンスを建てさせていただきました。とはいっても、あくまでも公式サイドさんが正式なやつを建ててくださるまでのつなぎとでもいいますか、お試し版みたいな感じを意図しております。（あとは自分のお勉強も兼ねています。）
    カービィのデビュー作『星のカービィ』が発売されてから今年で25周年となります。コラボイベントやオーケストラコンサートなども開催され、界隈はこれまでにない賑わいをみせております。このひとときを多くの同士たちと楽しみ・共有し・語っていただく場としてご利用くださいましたら幸いです。ｍ（＿＿）ｍ　（なにかあったときの連絡先：管理人のtwitter）

    mastodon.groningendigitalcity.com (preview)

    | Users: 196 | Toots: 1,270 | Connections: 276 |

    Groningse innovators helpen elkaar hier


    This Mastodon-instance is hosted in The Netherlands and has Dutch as its primary language.
    We have a strong focus on the (digital) community of the city of Groningen.

    If you’re not comfortable talking Dutch and some English, please register at another instance.

    (more) Moi eem! Wat barsten we van de ambitie in Stad en ommeland. Onze startups horen bij de snelst groeiende bedrijven in Nederland, onze fabrieken worden slimmer en we krijgen zowel een indrukwekkend Internet of Things-netwerk als een 5G-fieldlab. En oh ja: we proberen Tesla binnen te halen en willen de duurzaamste energieregio van het land worden.

    Misschien is het dus wel handig dat we elkaar goed weten te vinden. Voor inspiratie, ideeën, vragen en antwoorden. Waar dan ook over.

    Dat elkaar helpen, dat proberen we hier. Een Mastodon: een gezamenlijke plek, een soort interne Twitter. Een experiment, maar zo zijn we hier in Grunn: gewoon proberen en gáán.

    Zeg ook moi! Het is gewoon gratis, gaaf en vast gezellig.*

    • Eierbal niet inbegrepen, die’s al op…

summoners-riftodon.jp (preview)

| Users: 341 | Toots: 13,175 | Connections: 134 |

日本のLoLプレイヤーが交流をするためのマストドンインスタンスです

@yota と @utakata の個人によって運用されているもので、Riot公式のものではありませんのでご注意ください。

アンチハラスメントポリシー

ハラスメントとは、性差、性同一性と表現、性的指向、障害、外見や身体的特徴、人種、宗教、公共な場での性的な画像や類する表現、脅迫、ストーカー、望まない写真撮影や録音・録画、不適切な接触、およびそれらに関連した不快な言動が含まれます。
参加者が安心してコミュニティに集中できるよう、これらのハラスメント行為が行われないようにしてください。
私たちは、参加者へのハラスメント行為はいかなる形であれ容認しません。この原則に違反した参加者は、管理者の裁量により退場させられるものとします。また今後の参加が拒否される可能性があります。
これらの行為は、当コミュニティだけでなく、他SNSへの投稿、コメント等すべてにおいて認められないものとします。
これらのハラスメント行為を目撃した場合は管理者までご連絡ください。
私たちはすべての人が気持ちよくコミュニティに参加できるよう、尽力します。
皆様のご協力をお願いします。

(more)注意事項

公序良俗やアンチハラスメントポリシーに反する表現、法律に違反する行為等は禁止です。CW機能を活用するなどしてください。 機械的に大量のアカウントを取得したり、大量のトゥートを投稿する行為は禁止です。 違反したユーザーに対しては管理者の裁量やユーザーからのレポートに基づき、予告なくアカウント停止などの措置をとることがあります。 投稿されたトゥートや画像等の内容が永久的に保存されることは保障できかねますのでご注意ください。 この注意事項は追加・変更されることがありますのでご注意ください。 みんなが気持ちよく利用するためのルールです。ご理解とご協力をお願いします。

Discord

https://discord.gg/a9DsQM7 summoners-riftodonのメンバーでnormalに行く時に使いやすいかと思います。 すぷーんさんによって管理されています。

Email: Not Available

Admin: @yota@summoners-riftodon.jp

mangadon.biz (preview)

| Users: 60 | Toots: 45 | Connections: 66 |

マンガドン・ビズ
仕事としてマンガ業界に携わる方々の交流の場です。
プロの漫画家や、編集者、漫画家予備軍、アシスタント、書店員さん、電子書籍書店、取次の方々の交流の場です。

(more)プロの漫画家や、編集者、漫画家予備軍、アシスタント、書店員さん、電子書籍書店、取次の方々の交流の場です！ ここ数年、混沌とした状況が続いておりますが、日本が世界に誇るマンガ文化を一緒に盛り上げて行きましょう！！ —————————————————————————————– ★重要：登録確認メールが、迷惑メールフォルダに届く場合が多いようです！！特にGmailを使用している方からのご連絡が多いです。ご確認頂ければ幸いです！HTMLメールが受信できないスマホ等では登録できません！ ※善は急げ！ということで、急きょ開始致しました！今後の運営方針がまだ確定しておりません。 【利用規約/免責事項/禁止事項について】 ※トゥートに内容に関するトラブル等には、管理人は対応致しません。トゥートしたご本人に法的な責任が生じます。発言内容については、十分気を付けてトゥートして下さい。他の人の不快になるようなコメントを発言する方は、即座にアカウントを停止等を致します。本インスタンスを快適にご利用頂けるようご協力をお願いします。 ※自費で運営しておりますので、サーバの処理能力が非常に低スペックです。サーバーに負荷の掛かる行為は禁止させて頂きます。一度に30件以上のCSVフォローリストをインポートすると、処理能力を超えてしまいます。大量のフォローリストのインポート等は絶対にお控え下さい。Pawoo等と比べると数千倍のサーバスペックの差がありますので、ご理解頂ければ幸いです。 ※インスタンステーマと関係のない宣伝目的のアカウントは即時アカウントを削除致します。貧弱サーバなんです。 ※捜査機関等からの要請が来た場合は、アドレス等の個人情報を提供する可能性がございます。 ※サーバー費用等の負担が結構大きい為、今後運営費を賄う為に、広告等が入る可能性がございます。最終的に毎月ウン十万程度のサーバー費用が掛かる可能性もございます。 ご投稿頂いたトゥートは、多媒体での紹介や人口知能を用いたサービスで利用させて頂く場合がございます。収益が発生した場合は、運営しているインスタンスを継続させる為の費用（サーバー代、運営費等）に充てさせて頂きます。 ※利用規約に変更があった場合はこちらのページにてご報告致します。当インスタンスが別途定める場合を除き、本ページ上に規約を表示した時点より効力が生じるものとします。 ※このインスタンスの利用に際し、利用規約の解釈及び適用については、日本の法律に準拠いたします。本規約に関連する一切の紛争は、東京地方裁判所を唯一の合意専属管轄裁判所とさせて頂きます。

Email: Not Available

Admin: @mangakantoku@mangadon.biz

nijiura.xyz (preview)

| Users: 229 | Toots: 26,924 | Connections: 84 |

【Mastodon使用上の注意（全インスタンス共通）】
Mastodonはサービスの特性上、インスタンスごとに登録が必要です。複数のインスタンスに同じメールアドレスとパスワードで登録すると、登録したインスタンスの数分セキュリティが低下します。

セキュリティを気にされる場合は、普段のメールに影響を及ぼさないよう、普段使用するアドレスと別に、Mastodon専用で使う新しいメールアドレスとパスワードを作成し各インスタンスに使用することを推奨します。

にじうらますとどんは、
生まれたばかりのmastodonです。

応援して下さいね☆

お友達にもここを
教えてあげて下さいね。




にじうらますとどんを

虹裏そっくりにする

「ふたばどん」

作って頂きました！

https://userstyles.org/styles/141617/theme

【使い方】
GoogleChrome専用
install Stylishをクリックして拡張機能をインストール後
+ Install with Stylishを再度クリックしてください。
虹裏そっくりのデザインでmastodonを楽しめます。

(more) Contact

ﾏｽﾘﾆﾝ @masrinin

Business e-mail:

Email: Not Available

Admin: @masrinin@nijiura.xyz

  • Support ipv6

Cette instance is compatible IPv6 et obtient une bonne note niveau sécurité : A+ & A+ Quelques règles

Pas de flood. Respecter les autres utilisateurs. Utiliser le “cw” pour les contenus sensibles.

Le serveur

2 vCores x 2,4Ghz 4 Go de mémoire vive SSD de 10 Giga Bande passante de 100Mbps Debian 8 Evolution en fonction de la demande.

webcommunity.club (preview)

| Users: 75 | Toots: 248 | Connections: 123 |

webcommunity.club

(more)The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

Excessive advertising Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

Racism or advocation of racism Sexism or advocation of sexism Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

Sexual depictions of children Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person’s demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user’s access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Email: Not Available

Admin: @davatron5000@webcommunity.club

voxpop.mediacast.ca (preview)

| Users: 23 | Toots: 5 | Connections: 190 |

Open comment on current affairs with a Canadian focus. This instance embraces freedom of expression, as defined by our Charter. “Speak freely”, says the law student grading their own paper.

(more)Open to all, free to use. Terms of Use We’re working on it. Conduct

Failure to use the “#nsfw” tag when media attached to a message depicts material unsuitable for viewing by a Canadian youth audience (persons under 18 years of age), examples of which include:

nudity graphic violence

Content The following types of content are explicitly forbidden and will result in revocation of access to the service:

Sexual depictions of children and youth (persons under 18 years of age) Threats of violence Content illegal in Canada and/or the United States of America.

Federated instances Generally, follow their rules when visiting. Remote members will be expected to follow ours. For jurisdiction, start at the beginning. Network abuse Don’t do it.

Email: voxpop-contact@mediacast.ca

Admin: @support@voxpop.mediacast.ca

mastodon.nu (preview)

| Users: 120 | Toots: 433 | Connections: 638 |

Mastodon Site running on AWS (Frankfurt), managed from The Netherlands.

(more)This Mastodon instance is managed from The Netherlands, but can be used by any nationality. No restrictions on languages. Admin only speaks Dutch/English/German and a little French.

Launched April 12th, 2017.

The server runs on an Amazon AWS server, and is monitored for capacity / load. It can be extended if needed. Also, daily backups are created and stored in a different location.

Rules are easy: No illegal or offensive content.

Donations are welcome for maintaining and expanding the server.

Email: info@mastodon.nu

Admin: @ruudboy@mastodon.nu

kosmos.social (preview)

| Users: 164 | Toots: 1,491 | Connections: 539 |

A friendly place for tooting. Run by the Kosmos peeps.

(more)Technical Details kosmos.social is currently hosted on a dedicated server at Hetzner in Germany (renewable energy source, German laws apply). We configure and deploy everything via Chef cookbooks. Your uploads are stored on Amazon S3. Automated backups are run regularly and pushed to S3 as well. Our fork of the source code is publicly available at https://github.com/67P/mastodon/ (we deploy the kosmos branch). We frequently update the repo and running code with the latest fixes and improvements. TL;DR We know what we are doing and your data should be safe. However, since this is a free service, we do not guarantee it. IRC room If you’re into that jazz, you can find us in #kosmos on Freenode. If there’s no immediate response to a question, just idle for a while. The Rules The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of kosmos.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

Excessive advertising Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

Racism or advocation of racism Sexism or advocation of sexism Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

Sexual depictions of children Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person’s demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user’s access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Email: mail@kosmos.org

Admin: @kosmos@kosmos.social

mastodon.al (preview)

| Users: 21 | Toots: 257 | Connections: 416 |

A community for art, politics, and technology.

Ground rules:

  1. Don’t be an asshole.
  2. Talking about politics is fine, as long as you stay within the bounds of Rule 1. Politics doesn’t have to be CW’d here.
  3. If you post something NSFW, CW and mark it NSFW. If its NSFL, don’t post it here.
  4. If you see anything posted here or come in from the Federated Timeline that a reasonable person would not want hosted on their server, please report it.

| Users: 116 | Toots: 2,854 | Connections: 64 |

ルール

  • 法律は守ってください．犯罪に加担していそうだったり，日本法に抵触するようなトゥートは禁止です．最悪警察や裁判所の要請に応じてログを開示することになります．
  • エログロなどの理由で18禁になりそうな文章にはContent Warningを，画像にはNSFWタグを付けてください．例え付けていても日本法に抵触するような画像はダメです．
  • 連投や，フォロ爆などの過度に迷惑がかかる投稿は禁止です．スパムにしか見えないような宣伝とかもやめてね．
  • みんな仲良く．

| Users: 72 | Toots: 182 | Connections: 293 |

ルール

・法律、公序良俗に反する行為はしないこと。

・診療上知り得た秘密や個人情報を含む情報発信もしないこと。

・会話内容に制限はないですが、医療系な話題が多くなると思われます。

・みんななかよく

注意事項

アカウント登録時、確認メールが届かない場合あり、このような時は「迷惑フォルダ」に入ってる可能性が高いので確認をお願いします。

catdon.jp (preview)

| Users: 35 | Toots: 148 | Connections: 54 |

このインスタンスについて

  • ねこ専門のインスタンスです。
  • あなたのお気に入りのねこを紹介し合いませんか?
  • ねこアカウントも大歓迎です。
  • 登録パスワードは暗号化されており、運営者であってもその内容を解析することはできません。
  • サーバ上のデータは厳重に管理するよう、努めています。
    • 運用ステータスはこちら

(more)お願い並びに説明事項

あなたのお気に入りのねこを紹介し合いませんか? ねこアカウントも大歓迎です。 IPv6にも多分対応しています。 各国の法律及び、日本国内の法律を厳守してください。 公序良俗に反する投稿はおやめください。 サーバーに負荷のかかるご利用方法はおやめください。 プライバシーポリシーについてこちらを参照して下さい。

botsin.space (preview)

| Users: 253 | Toots: 59,482 | Connections: 541 |

This instance is for bots and bot allies. Anyone can sign up to be a user here or run your bot here.

Users agree to the Code of Conduct listed on the extended description page.

(more)Code of Conduct NOTE: these are initial and subject to change

Anyone is welcome to open an account either as your personal account, or to run a bot. Open as many bot accounts as you like. If you run a bot here, please be kind to the servers. If the instance starts to bog down, bots that are making lots of API calls will get shut down. Do not use bots to abuse users. Bots should punch up, not down.

If you have questions or concerns, feel free to contact me at muffinista@mastodon.social, @muffinista on twitter, or by emailing colin at muffinlabs.com

Email: colin@muffinlabs.com

tenforward.social (preview)

| Users: 165 | Toots: 4,123 | Connections: 700 |

Welcome to Ten Forward, a Star Trek themed Mastodon instance!

For more information on what Ten Forward is in the Star Trek universe, please read this page on Memory-Alpha.

The instance is not restricted to Star Trek role-play or characters. More general purpose use is welcome.

(more)Want to support our community financially? I have set up two methods of supporting our community:

Patreon PayPal

Our supporters

@Morn @Q @Dathon

Thank you for any support you provide! Alliance policy We are currently open to allying with all other empires. Any changes to this policy will be noted here. Blacklisted instances

pawoo.net (Silence with media block) shitposter.club freezepeach.xyz sealion.club social.heldscal.la noagendasocial.com unsafe.space

Code of Conduct This instance borrows the code of conduct from the good folks of toot.cat. As tooters on this instance, we pledge to uphold an environment that is radically inclusive with respect for all users of the instance. We are committed to making participation in this instance an oppression-free experience for everyone, regardless of level of experience, gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, or nationality. We define oppression as any language or action that expresses, reinforces, upholds or sympathizes with any form of systemic social domination. Examples of unacceptable behavior by participants include: Personal attacks Trolling or insulting/derogatory comments Public or private oppressive language or actions Other unethical conduct Users are empowered and responsible for addressing any abuses of the Code of Conduct such that the project remains an oppression-free experience. Certain types of content should posted in such a way that you avoid showing it to non-consenting parties. These types of content should:

Not be used a profile picture Be posted with a “NSFW” tag Not be posted to the public timeline

the above rules apply to content that is:

Sexualized Violent Flashing or rapidly changing

By adopting this Code of Conduct, users commit themselves to fairly and consistently applying these principles to every aspect of using this instance. users who do not follow or enforce the Code of Conduct may be permanently banned. This Code of Conduct applies both to toots on tenforward.social and to public spaces when an individual is representing tenforward.social or its community. Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be reported by contacting an admin by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and investigated and will result in a response that is deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances. Admins are obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

Email: guinan@tenforward.social

Admin: @guinan@tenforward.social

tusk.schoollibraries.net (preview)

| Users: 5 | Toots: 5 | Connections: 49 |

This Instance has been created to help educators collaborate and provide feedback to establish and improve the School Libraries Resource Network

(more)In the nineteen-eighties, the Internet was a small, decentralized collective of computers. This is not the same Internet we know today. Today most communication flows through a small set of corporations; and thus, falls under the influence of those companies and institutions.

Internet users now regularly submit to terms-of-service agreements that give companies license to share their personal data with other institutions, from advertisers to governments.

Distributed solutions like Mastodon and WebSonar will allow us to start to create outposts that can grow into the better web Berners-Lee envisions, where users control where their data is stored and how it’s accessed.

For example, social networks would still run in the cloud. But you could store your data locally. Alternately, you could choose a different cloud server run by a company or community you trust.

Email: cowboy@wisdomquest.com

Admin: Not Available

あくまで日本国内の法律に基づいて使用して下さい。

(more)特徴など 毎日午前4時に自動的にmasterに追従するようにしてみました。 その間はサービスを一旦停止しているため、502エラーなどが出る事があります。 さくらのVPS、東京第2ゾーンにて動かしています。

管理人 @mizumasa
副管理人 @kwmt

(more)マストドンはメディアアートだ。

マストドンは、従来の中央集権的SNSに対するアンチテーゼとして、情報操作など、全ての情報が一箇所にのみ管理されてしまうことの危険性を示唆しました。人々の関心を喚起し、新しいメディアを作り出すこと。それこそがメディアアートであり、開発者のオイゲン・ロッコ氏に敬意を表し、メディアアート向けMastodonを立ち上げます。

Email: mediartodon@gmail.com

| Users: 10 | Toots: 111 | Connections: 45 |

為替(FX)なMastodonサーバーです

(more) □ このサイトの方針とお願い まだまだ発展途上なMastodonですので、いろいろと手探りしながらの運営にご理解くださいませ。現状はサーバーリソースも貧弱ですが、ひとまずは問題ないと思いたいです。汗

楽しんで参加してください 為替以外のトゥートもＯＫです botなどでの高速トゥートはご遠慮ください 自動的な大量フォローも耐え切れませんのでご遠慮を 法律は守りましょう スパム行為もやめてください 人として恥ずかしくない行動を

go-newbie.club (preview)

| Users: 83 | Toots: 889 | Connections: 239 |

囲碁○新米●倶楽部

囲碁をこれから始めたい、始めたばかり、長くやってるけどなかなか上達しない、昔ルールを習ったがよくわからないうちにそれっきりになってしまった、そんな皆さんのための小さな碁盤（9路盤・13路盤）を中心にした情報交換の場です。というのは、あるていど囲碁が打てる人のための大きな碁盤（19路盤）についての情報なら書店・ネット・テレビなどにたくさんあるからです。
もう１９路盤でガンガン打っているという方もぜひアドバイザーとしてご参加ください。

棋譜の投稿にはつぶや棋譜が便利です。盤上に棋譜を入力した後、「URL作成のみ」ボタンを押し、できたURLを本文に貼り付けてください。

管理人はこちらです。よろしければフォローお願いします。

(more)Mastodon インスタンス「囲碁囲碁○新米●倶楽部」は株式会社きっずファイブが運営します。

利用規約

１．利用規約の適用 株式会社きっずファイブ（以下「当社」といいます）は、利用者にソーシャルネットワーキングサービス（以下、「本サービス」といいます）を提供するため、以下に本サービス利用規約（以下、「本規約」といいます）を定め、利用者は、本規約により本サービスを利用するものとします。

２．禁止行為 利用者は、本サービスの利用にあたり、次のいずれかに該当する行為をしてはならないものとします。なお、禁止行為に該当するかどうは、当社が独自の判断で行うことができるものとし、掲載情報の変更、登録削除を含めた適切な処置をとります。

(1) 他人に迷惑をかけたり不快感を与える行為 (2) 法令又は公序良俗に反する行為 (3) 会員ＩＤやパスワードを不正に使う行為 (4)システムに負担をかける行為 (5)１人で複数のＩＤを持つ行為 (6)１つのＩＤを複数人で利用する行為 (7)無差別に面識のない人を招待する行為 (8) その他、当社が不適当と判断した行為

３．免責事項 利用者は、本サービス内での自らの行為において責任を負うものとします。 当社は、本サービスをいつでも任意の理由で中止することができます。 当社は、本サービスの利用、または利用ができないことによって引き起こされた（直接的、間接的を問わず）損害について、一切責任を負いません。

４．利用者の同意、法的手続き 利用者は、本サービス を利用することにより、この利用規約すべての記載内容について、同意されたものとみなされます。またこの利用規約は当社の判断で任意に変更されます。将来引き続きご利用になる場合は、その時点での内容に同意されているとみなされます。

この利用規約の準拠法は日本法とします。また、本サービス またはこの規約に関連して当社と皆様の間で生じた紛争については京都地方裁判所を第一審専属管轄裁判所とします。

Email: masamitu@kids5.com

Admin: @igokyoto@go-newbie.club

writing.exchange (preview)

| Users: 12 | Toots: 40 | Connections: 136 |

Writing Exchange is a small, focused community for poets, writers, bloggers, and anyone else who makes things. It was started by Matt from Write.as.

(more)We’re an inclusive community that welcomes all, as long as you’re kind and respectful to others. We aim to provide an environment where you feel comfortable enough to participate freely and authentically. If you’re not interested in that, there are plenty of other great instances you can join. Guidelines We’ll be more specific in the future, but in general, be good to each other. Enjoy talking to strangers (and friends!) on the internet, and give people the benefit of the doubt. If problems arise, please use Mastodon’s features to Block, Mute, or Report users that are causing problems. If you need more help, contact @matt. Once you’ve joined Introduce yourself! Communities like these work best when they’re filled with strangers who talk to each other. Background This is an experiment to see if we can create a small, purposeful community among the fediverse, with the eventual goal being a sustainable, community-run instance. If you’d like to help make that happen, get in touch.

Email: hi@writing.exchange

Admin: @matt@writing.exchange

tsuruga.net (preview)

| Users: 33 | Toots: 172 | Connections: 84 |

敦賀を盛り上げるために作ったMastodon（マストドン）です。
敦賀市民はもちろん敦賀出身者やそれ以外の方も大歓迎です！

アカウント作成手順
１．ユーザー名を半角英数で入力します。（登録後変更不可）
２．メールアドレスとパスワードを入力して参加するをクリックします。
３．その後、登録したアドレス宛てに確認用のメールが届きます。受信トレイではなく「迷惑メールフォルダ」に入る場合もありますのでご注意ください。
４．受信したメールにある「メールアドレス確認」をクリックしてください。
５．以上でアカウント作成は完了です。楽しいマストドンライフを！

ルール

  • 皆さんが気持ちよくご利用頂けるようご配慮をお願いします。
  • ネタバレやその他の理由によりユーザーへの配慮が必要な投稿の場合はCWタグやNSFWタグを付けてください。（CWタグ･NSFWタグについてはこちらをご覧ください）
  • 上記タグを付けている場合でもR-18コンテンツのトゥート（投稿）は禁止です。
  • 当方でもセキュリティ対策を行っておりますが、パスワードの使いまわしはご遠慮ください。
  • データの消失に対しては責任を負いかねますので予めご了承ください。


禁止行為

  • 公序良俗に反する行為
  • 日本国内の法律に違反する行為
  • 他者に中傷・脅迫・経済的もしくは精神的に損害や不利益を与える行為
  • 実在の人物・団体などになりすます行為
  • サーバに極端な負荷をかける行為
これらの行為が見られる場合、予告なくアカウントをブロックし参加をお断りさせて頂きます。


お問い合わせ先

  • メール　mastodon@eigadaisuke.com
  • メールフォーム　http://eigadaisuke.com/contact/

支援（サーバー維持費は個人負担のためご支援頂けると助かります）

  • Enty　https://enty.jp/eigadaisuke
  • DYC’s STORE　https://dycmovie.stores.jp/
  • ウィッシュリスト　http://amzn.asia/49YPek4

運営者：DYCエンターテインメント代表 山下大裕

オフィシャルサイト 映画監督山下大裕の2020年全国公開への道

(more)運営者プロフィール 山下大裕（やました･だいすけ） 1992年6月9日生まれ、24歳。福井県敦賀市出身、東京在住。福井県立敦賀高等学校普通科を経て日本映画大学映画学部映画学科脚本演出コース1期卒業。20歳の冬を迎えた2013年、地元敦賀を舞台にした自主製作映画『SNOWGIRL』(62分)を初監督。その2年後、2015年には敦賀映画第2弾と銘打ちオール敦賀ロケで『弥生の虹』(74分)を監督。18歳の頃から“2020年までに全国公開作を撮る”と公言し『映画で敦賀を盛り上げる』をテーマに日々奮闘中。2017年現在、敦賀市の委託を受け観光ショートムービー『いつか、きらめきたくて。』（全4話）を製作中。 オフィシャルサイト 映画監督山下大裕の2020年全国公開への道

Email: mastodon@eigadaisuke.com

Admin: Not Available

mstdn.tokyocameraclub.com (preview)

| Users: 908 | Toots: 5,868 | Connections: 34 |

mstdn.tokyocameraclub.comは東京カメラ部が運営するMastodonのインスタンス（サーバー）です。 「カメラがある暮らし」をより楽しくすることを目的として、写真や動画などを投稿・閲覧するためのグループです。こちらの趣旨に賛同いただける方はどなたでも無料で参加いただけます。

運営方針

東京カメラ部の公式アカウントではMastodon、Facebook、Instagramなどから東京カメラ部とその分室に投稿いただいた作品の一部を適宜紹介させていただきます。

Mastodonでの東京カメラ部への投稿は投稿にハッシュタグ「#tokyocameraclub」を付けていただくだけで完了します。

その他運営方針はFacebookの東京カメラ部と同等となりますので、詳しくはそちらをご覧ください。

http://app.minpos.com/fb/willvii/camera_jpn/static/faq/

禁止行為

  • 著作権違反など日本国の法律に違反するする行為
  • 他者の人格、作品を誹謗中傷する行為
  • 実在の企業、組織、団体、人格、ブランド、商品などになりすます行為
  • 公序良俗に反する行為
  • 無闇にサーバーの負荷を高める行為
  • 禁止行為を行う方はアカウントを停止させていただく場合があります

注意事項

  • 確認メールが届くまで時間がかかるときがあります
  • 1－2時間たっても確認メールが届かない場合は迷惑メールに分類されている可能性があります。お手数ですが迷惑メールフォルダーを確認なさってください。
  • 本インスタンスは試験運用中です。予告なくメンテナンス実施、データリセット、サービス終了がなされる可能性はあります。
  • 当社は自社の裁量により利用者が本サービス規約に違反したと判断した場合は利用者のアカウントを削除、または利用者の本サービスへのアクセスを予告なく、また責任を利用者に対して負うことなく制限することがあります
  • 当社は本サービスを円滑に運営する目的で本規約を予告なく随時変更することがあります

連絡先

camera.jpn@tokyocameraclub.com

(more) Contact

Tokyo Camera Club @tokyocameraclub

Business e-mail: camera.jpn@tokyocameraclub.com

Email: camera.jpn@tokyocameraclub.com

Admin: @tokyocameraclub@mstdn.tokyocameraclub.com

mstdn.hakai-macaron.com (preview)

| Users: 107 | Toots: 1,182 | Connections: 490 |

大学のメールアドレスで登録できる学生用Mastodon
登録できるドメインは
このインスタンスについてを参照
ドメインが怪しくてすみません

(more)大学メールドメイン(ac.jp等)でしか登録できません。ご注意くださいメールアドレスの間違いが多いです！お気を付けくださいメールが数分待っても来なかったら再送リクエストしてください 登録できるドメイン

一部大学で発行されてる生涯メール専用ドメイン等では登録できません なかった場合は一報ください ac.jpaoyama.jpc-league.jpchiba-u.jphgu.jpkeio.jpnagoya-u.jpnaist.jpnitech.jpoecu.jpocic.jpoist.jpous.jpsendai-nct.jpsenshu-u.jptokai.jptoyo.jpwaseda.jpynu.jpchibakoudai.jp

注意

あくまで学生のお遊び鯖です 何らかの形でデータ吹っ飛ぶかも、ごめんなさい お金がなくなったら支援を募るか、閉鎖します

立てた目的

なんとなく面白そう 学生がお試しで試せるような鯖があればいいな 自分も学生なのでお試しで立ててみた感はある

禁止事項

無断転載禁止 サークルなどの団体としての登録 サーバに負荷をかける行為 その他、法律で禁止されている行為 まぁ何もかもほどほどに

その他

サーバーが死んでたら@tennen_macaronまで

Email: Not Available

Admin: @macaron@mstdn.hakai-macaron.com

mastodons.jp (preview)

| Users: 50 | Toots: 694 | Connections: 251 |

大阪江坂在住のウェブ屋さんが立てたインスタンスです。 好きにしてもいいのよ？

(more)基本的にゆる～く、放任チックに運営していこうと考えています。 あまりにめちゃくちゃな使い方でもしない限りは好きに使ってOKです。 もしサーバの負荷が大きくなってきたらサーバスペックをすぐ引き上げられるようにはしていますので、その辺りは運営の懐具合と相談ということで宜しくお願いします。

table#about {border:collapse:collapse;margin-top:15px;border:1px solid #9baec8;} table#about th, table#about td {padding:5px;} table#about th {text-align:right;}

ブログ：Demence/Cup Twitter：@rutti17 Facebook：るっち

Email: administrator@mastodons.jp

Admin: @rutti@mastodons.jp

mastube.jp (preview)

| Users: 6 | Toots: 2 | Connections: 1 |

MasTube = Mas(todon)＋(You)Tube
『YouTubeを愛するユーザーが自由に交流できる場所』をテーマとしたYouTuberやファンの方々向けのSNSです。Mastodonインスタンスとしてトレンド発信サイトLove Laboratoryが運営しています。

(more) 本インスタンスはYouTubeを愛する人向けのSNSとなっているので、そのポリシーに反する人はご遠慮ください。 MasTubeはインスタンスに所属するユーザーファーストなSNSです。そのため、ご要望等あればinfo@mastube.jpまでご連絡お願いいたします。

Email: info@mastube.jp

mikado-city.jp (preview)

| Users: 17 | Toots: 72 | Connections: 13 |

トリガーオン！ようこそ、三門市へ！ こちらは、ワールドトリガーファンSNS（非公式）です。 語りでも絵でも踊りでもなんでもオッケー。 ただし、良識の範囲内でね。 セキュリティの観点から、登録時のメアドは、捨て垢にすることを強く推奨します。

(more)個人が運営している、ワールドトリガーファンSNS（非公式）です。

できる限り長く運営したいと考えていますが、 やむを得ない事情により、突如終了する可能性もあります。

公序良俗に反する行為、日本国内の法律に違反する行為は禁止とします。

social.lou.lt (preview)

| Users: 4,595 | Toots: 28,893 | Connections: 1,183 |

Mostly French instance - Read full description for rules.

(more)English version below, this instance is motsly french speaking. Le respect de la loi et des autres utilisateurs sont obligatoires. Les propos racistes, sexistes, homophobes, etc. sont strictement interdits. Les comptes parodiques sont tolérés à condition de signaler qu'ils le sont dans leur description. Tous les contenus sont tolérés dans la limite de la légalité, utilisez le content warning pour les contenus inadaptés au public mineur ou nsfw. N'hésitez pas à signaler tout message ne respectant pas les règles. Toute personne ne respectant pas les règles pourra voir son compte suspendu.

Compliance with the law and respect of other users are mandatory. Racist, sexist, homophobic, etc. messages are strictly prohibited. Parody account are allowed as long as their parodic status is clearly indicated in their description. Any type of content is allowed within the limits of the law, use content warning for nsfw or unsuitable for children contents. Feel free to report any message that do not follow the rules. Any user who breaks the rules may get suspended without warning.

Email: maxime+mastodon@melinon.fr

Admin: @DrEmixam@social.lou.lt

yukari.cloud (preview)

| Users: 252 | Toots: 5,194 | Connections: 406 |

結月ゆかりさんの動画・歌・絵などを制作している方、視聴する方、好きな方が集うMastodon（マストドン）結月ゆかりインスタンスです。
インスタンスでの話題は、結月ゆかり関連だけでなくても構いません。どんどんトゥートしてOKです！
since 2017/04/18

(more) ご利用規約 ご利用に際して関連するすべての法律・法令などを遵守されるものとします。 R-18 コンテンツは、テキストには「Content Warning（内容に注意）」タグを、画像には「NSFW（仕事中閲覧注意）」タグを付けてください。 権利やライセンス等を侵害すること、実在の人物・団体などになりすます行為、サーバに極端な負荷をかける行為や妨害する行為は、固くお断りします。 画像、音声、ロゴ・標章などの著作権及びその他の権利は各権利者に帰属します。

免責事項 本インスタンスの情報によるいかなる損失や損害、賠償要求に対しても、その責任を一切負わないものとします。

サーバについて さくらのVPS v4 石狩第1ゾーン IPv6 Ready Mastodon + nginx + PostgreSQL + Redis

Special thanks aboutページおよびスタートページイラスト：ペテン師(@sagisagiz)様

last modified: 2017-05-12 16:29

Email: 65rokugou(at)gmail.comgmail.com)

Admin: @65@yukari.cloud

gadget.inpocket.net (preview)

(more)Gadget in Pocket(ポッケの中のガジェット) gadget.inpocket.netは、ガジェット好きな人たちが集まれるマストドンサイトです。 小型コンピュータやモバイル,おもちゃ ガジェット好きな人が交流できる場所として gadget.inpocket.net マストドン をご利用ください。 法的に問題のある行為、また他人を不快にさせる行為があった場合には、無条件でアカウントを停止する場合があります。

animalliberation.social (preview)

| Users: 592 | Toots: 1,428 | Connections: 504 |

Animal Liberation Network is a community for animal activists on the Mastodon network. You can connect with other activists through the local timeline, as well as spread your activism to the outside world with the federated timeline. Please read our rules!

(more)This is a website by and for animal activists. The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of animalliberation.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

Excessive advertising Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

Racism or advocation of racism Sexism or advocation of sexism Speciesism or advocation of speciesism Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

Sexual depictions of children Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person’s demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user’s access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Email: alex@alexgleason.me

Admin: @alex@animalliberation.social

shigadon.com (preview)

| Users: 74 | Toots: 428 | Connections: 205 |

「滋賀丼」滋賀県民の憩いの場。 滋賀、びわ湖に関する、滋賀に住む、滋賀に関係のある、滋賀の大好きな方々によるコミュニティーです。

(more)滋賀丼と申します。 滋賀、びわ湖に関する、滋賀に住む、滋賀に関係のある、滋賀の大好きな方々によるコミュニティーです。 特徴など 毎朝3時〜6時ごろにメンテナンスしてます。5分程度アクセスができなくなります。

ルールなど

日本の法律に反する行為や犯罪行為は禁止です 公序良俗に反する行為はおやめください 他者の権利を侵害する行為は禁止です 実在の人物・団体などのなりすましは禁止です サーバに極端な負荷をかける行為は管理人の負担になるのでおやめください 明確にBOTと判断できない形で、交流を目的としない自動投稿および連携投稿は禁止します。 みんな仲良く

サーバロケーション ConohaVPSの東京リージョンで以下のスペックにて動作しています。最小構成ですが、4月末現在でDISCの使用量は30％程度です。登録者数に影響するのかな。

vCPU数 1 Core

メモリ 512 MB

ディスク 20 GB SSD

サーバースペック

CentOS7 Nginx 1.12.0 PostgreSQL 9.4 Redis 2.8.17

サーバー維持費に関して 「滋賀丼」の運営維持への支援をお願いいたします。 寄付には２種類あり、１回だけの寄付と毎月の寄付の形があります。毎月の場合は、その下の「購読をキャンセル」のボタンにて解除ができます。 お名前掲載をご希望の場合はメールなどでごいただければ対応させていただきますので、お気軽にご連絡ください。 Paypalの決済サイトに飛びますので、サイトの指示に従っていただければご支援いただけるようになっております。

１回払いでの登録となります。

滋賀丼の寄付 1. ¥300 JPY 2. ¥500 JPY 3. ¥1,000 JPY

毎月払いでの登録となります。

滋賀丼の維持費(毎月) 1. : ¥100 JPY - 毎月 2. : ¥300 JPY - 毎月 3. : ¥500 JPY - 毎月

毎月払いを選択頂いた方で、キャンセルをご希望の方は以下のリンクで 手続きを進めてください。

その他 メールが届かないという方は直接下記へお問い合わせください。メールアドレスが間違ってる場合は個別対応となります。

謝辞

滋賀丼についてのページはこんじまさんのぺーじを参考にさせていただきました。

Email: rinmon1963@gmail.com

Admin: @rinmon@shigadon.com

jidoridon.com (preview)

| Users: 199 | Toots: 133 | Connections: 7 |

自撮り好きと、それを応援するパオラ―達でわちゃわちゃ交流するインスタンス。自撮りを投稿すると住民がパオパオ喜びます。楽しいインスタンスにしたいです。ハッキングから今晩のおかずまでどんな話題でも自由にトゥートしてもらって構いませんが、楽しいトゥートを心掛けてね。タイムラインチラ見 → コチラ

ルール

  • 小さいお友達が見るかもしれないので、刺激の強い画像にはNSFW(Not Safe For Work) を付けてください→画像を選択したあと下のNSFWをポチッで付けれます。
  • 犯罪目的・公序良俗に反する・それらを助長するような行為の禁止
  • 過度な広告活動・勧誘の禁止
  • ルールを守れない人はBANされる場合があります
  • (´・ω・`) 仲良く使ってね

その他

  • トップの二次絵を募集しております（現在：@shuzanさん画）

    • (more) Contact

    Business e-mail: jidoridon@gmail.com

    Email: jidoridon@gmail.com

    scuba.masdon.life (preview)

    | Users: 21 | Toots: 166 | Connections: 89 |

    スクーバダイバーが海やショップの情報を共有するMastodon

    利用者
    スクーバダイバーの方
    スクーバダイビングを始めようと考えている方

    利用ルール
    日本の法律に抵触するようなコンテンツは厳禁です。
    エログロなど、他人が不快に思う可能性のあるトゥートをする場合は、CW/NSFWを必ず設定してください。
    データの保証・サービスの可用性の保証はいたしません。(最善は尽くします)

    メンテナンスについて
    不定期で下記のメンテナンスを実施します。
    1. Mastodon のバージョンアップメンテナンス
    2. ディスク容量不足時の対応メンテナンス

    インスタンス情報
    MastodonのVersionは1.3.3です。
    pawoo.net と friends.nico をドメインブロックしています。
    2017/4/24 からさくらのVPS 1Gメモリプランで運用しています。

    管理人とダイビング
    2004 年に NAUI スクーバダイバーを取得(現在はアドバンス)
    ダイビング本数は約350本
    最近は年５回くらい伊豆大島で潜っている。

    管理人とサーバとMastodon
    サーバの構築、運用の経験は10年以上
    Mastodonに使われている技術の運用経験は、ほぼ0
    このインスタンスの運用は管理人の技術向上目的でもあります。

    (more) Contact

    ma3ki＠next-diving-5/26 @ma3ki

    Business e-mail: ma3ki@ma3ki.net

    Email: ma3ki@ma3ki.net

    Admin: @ma3ki@scuba.masdon.life

    mastodon-lyontech.fr (preview)

    | Users: 14 | Toots: 83 | Connections: 146 |

    Lyontech est une instance Mastodonte indépendante, gérée et hébergée en France. Si vous rencontrez un problème lors de votre inscription, contactez moi sur mastodon.lyontech.fr@gmail.com .

    If you encounter problem to register or other, please contact me at mastodon.lyontech.fr@gmail.com .


    Les comptes publicitaires et corporate sont interdits. Ainsi que les comptes faisant l'apologie du nazisme ou du terrorisme, ou de tout autre sujet enfreignant la loi Française, les droits de l'homme, etc…

    Advertising and corporate accounts are forbidden! As well as accounts defending Nazism or terrorism, offending French law or human’s rights.


    Utilisez les tags NSFW ou CW pour les images pornographiques ou non recommandées pour des personnes sensibles (si vous suivez les règles de censure de facebook, ça devrait aller).

    Use NSFW or CW tags for porn or hard images (the kind of censorship encountered on facebook is a good start).

    Vous voulez me donner quelque-chose pour m'aider à payer l'hébergement?

    Want to help me pay for hosting fees?

    Business e-mail: patrick.laxton@gmail.com

    aleph.land (preview)

    | Users: 722 | Toots: 21,451 | Connections: 1,031 |

    aleph.land

    (more)Welcome to the א community!

    First, here are the main ideas behind our rules that should be yours:

    The respect of others is primary. This instance wants to be peaceful and welcoming. Each user is responsible of their account.

    Rules of Aleph.land

    You can be suspended for:

    Sharing content that is illegal in France (pedophilia, mainly). Taking part of a harassment. Putting someone in danger. Having a racist, sexist, discriminating or oppressive talk. Voluntarily degrading the prosperity or the good atmosphere of the instance.

    You can be muted from the public timelines for:

        Posting a media, some text or a link to the following contents without an explicit content warning and NSFW cover:

    nudity (#nude) gore (#gore) pornography (#porn) a flashy media that could be harmful for photosensitive people (#epilepsywarning) spoil (#spoil)

    Unpleasant shitposting or flooding. Making abusive ads. Posting automatic toots from another source.

    Please keep in mind that this rules are here to guarantee a good experience to everyone on the instance. Also, this list is not exhaustive and moderators will do their best to solve problems that may not have been specified here. If you have any question, or suggestion, don’t hesitate to contact me at @Madeorsk@aleph.land! :)

    You can also donate every month to help me to maintain this instance: patreon.com/alephland

    Email: madeorsk@protonmail.com

    Admin: @Madeorsk@aleph.land

    mastodon.night.coffee (preview)

    | Users: 199 | Toots: 559 | Connections: 521 |

    Mastodon instance based in Oklahoma, USA for night.coffee and friends. We are one of many federated Mastodon instances and aim to be friendly and socially responsible. See our extended about page for more details.

    (more)mastodon.night.coffee We’re a laid back instance that enjoys the finer points of geek culture. Don’t be a douche/nazi. The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.night.coffee; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism Sexism or advocation of sexism Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person’s demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment. Bot software that automates posts, aggregates other user content, or other such behavior is considered spam and will result in an immediate silence or suspension of the account.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user’s access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: tim@night.coffee

    Admin: @bratta@mastodon.night.coffee

    xn–zck4azd638n.com (preview)

    | Users: 17 | Toots: 401 | Connections: 389 |

    マスト丼.com 🍚　日本サーバーです。
    マスト丼🍚ですがフリーテーマなマストドンです。登録お待ちしています。

    重要なお知らせ

    日本語ドメインで運用していますがマストドンが日本語ドメインに対応していないため、リモートフォローをするときは、次のような形で入力をお願いします。

    あなたのアカウント名@xn–zck4azd638n.com

    ルール

    • 日本国内の法律を守りましょう
    • 投稿するトゥートは、内容に応じて適切に公開範囲を設定しましょう(例：R18画像はNSFW、文章はCWなど)

    インスタンスについて

    Google Cloud Platformの東京リージョンで稼働させています。

    n1-standard-1(1 vCPU, 3.75GB RAM)

    連絡先について

    このページの右上の犬アイコンから、もしくは下記にお願いします。

    • Mastodon : @noko
    • Twitter : @noko_k

    (more) Contact

    Noriyuki Kazusawa マスト丼🍚 @noko

    Business e-mail: nokok.kz@gmail.com

    Email: nokok.kz@gmail.com

    Admin: @noko@xn–zck4azd638n.com

    social.csswg.org (preview)

    | Users: 115 | Toots: 94 | Connections: 302 |

    Mastodon server for anyone interested in CSS or general web development

    (more)The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of social.csswg.org; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism Sexism or advocation of sexism Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person’s demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user’s access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: csswg@csswg.org

    Admin: @csswg@social.csswg.org

    vulpine.club (preview)

    | Users: 125 | Toots: 9,788 | Connections: 764 |

    The Vulpine Club is an Mastodon instance for foxes, and their associates and friends and fans. We’re pretty friendly and welcoming. =^^=

    (more)Welcome to the Vulpine Club! We hope you’ll enjoy your stay here, and that you’ll have lots of interesting discussions and learn about the really neat people around the fediverse. This is a unique and exciting network, and we’re pleased you’re joining us. Please read the rest of this page to make sure you know what this is all about, and how to play within the rules. Guiding Principle: The Vulpine Club believes strongly in civility and respectfulness as a cornerstone of any online community. Be excellent to each other. Keeping the Lights On: We have a Patreon to help cover the costs of running this thing. Feel free to chip in as little or as much as you’d like. <3 Special thanks to our sustaining supporters: Irick 🐁🐈⚩ and (anonymous)! THANK YOU ALWAYS! Administrator(s): You may e-mail the admins at admins@vulpine.club. For reference, all admins are listed below:

    PronounsE-mailRoleAlternate account

    Rey they/them rey@vulpine.club Owner @hoopycat@mastodon.social

    We also have a status page hosted by StatusCake. Local Flava:

    Favourites are now Licks Boosts are now Awoos Toots continue to be Toots

    See also our Github fork, and the differences between our production branch and the tootsuite master. How To Get Banned: Be advised your access may be revoked at any time for any reason, especially if you are a:

    Person too young to do the Internet, per the Law (i.e. by using this site, you affirm that you are 13 years of age or older), Person who posts content such as:

    Copyrighted content posted without permission Sexual depictions of children Stuff we really don’t want to see (untagged pornography/sexual content, gore, graphic violence, etc)

    Nazi and/or National Socialist and/or Fascist and/or Alt-Right and/or Alt-Furry, Homophobe, Transphobe, Racist, Sexist, Islamophobe, Men’s Rights Activist, Xenophobe, et cetera, General Douchebag and/or Overall Asshat, and/or Current President of the United States of America

    Doxxing, brigading, dogpiling, stalking, harassing, and other similar attacks against a person’s right to exist without you, are explicitly prohibited. Using alternate accounts to evade blocks/suspends/silences, whether on the same instance or another instance, is prohibited. Accounts from other instances will be locally silenced or suspended​ for reported violation of these rules. CoC violations by instance administrators may be enforced on the entire instance​, particularly for single-user instances. These rules evolve on a regular basis. Most folks will never run afoul of them, which should give us hope for the future. Guidelines: The following are suggested ways to be excellent to each other, in no particular order.

    If someone is violating the rules, please report the toot(s) in question, and also consider blocking them. Try to apply content warnings/NSFW tags for long posts, animated GIFs, sensitive topics, etc. This is not a hard-and-fast rule, and we’re not going to insta-ban violations, but keeping the Public Timelines usable for as many folks as possible is a goal. Content warnings should definitely be used for pornography, lewd roleplay, spoilers, curse-laden diatribes, photographs of gentlemen named Richard, etc. Content warnings may be used for news, politics, long stories, etc. Community standards are still evolving on this topic. It’s a good idea to check your privilege occasionally. Many members of this community identify as part of one or more oft-repressed minority groups (lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, queer, person of color, disabled, neurodivergent, etc). Don’t expect individuals to produce peer-reviewed research to “prove” their experiences are real; if you’re skeptical, do your own research or ask the community as a whole. We don’t really mind bots, as long as the bots don’t interact with people without their consent. Follow bots will be blocked on sight. On the other hand, if someone made a bot that tooted pictures of foxes every hour, we’ll probably give you a certificate of appreciation.

    Ownership: This server is operated from Rochester, New York, United States. For First Amendment Defense Act purposes, our legal religion within the United States is The Satanic Temple, and we adhere to the seven fundamental tenets. Outside of the United States, we operate under the Principia Discordia and its three core principles, except on Sweetmorn, when we operate without any principles whatsoever, unless it is a Apostle Holyday, in which case we do not operate without any principles whatsoever. Federation Policy: Our default federation policy is open, but in the interest of fostering a useful and pleasant experience, we will block domains that are known to be lawless havens of iniquity. For your convenience, these are listed below.

    Last update: 2017/04/30

    Domain Severity Why

    shitposter.club

    suspend haven for harassment

    freezepeach.xyz

    suspend haven for harassment

    sealion.club

    suspend haven for harassment

    social.heldscal.la

    suspend haven for harassment

    wogan.im

    suspend single-user instance violating our CoC

    noagendasocial.com

    suspend podcast dudebro brigade, no CoC, admin violations of our CoC

    social.tchncs.de

    suspend CoC not enforced (harasser still present after multiple reports/incidents)

    ediot.social

    suspend their CoC pretty much covers it

    Email: admins@vulpine.club

    Admin: @rey@vulpine.club

    | Users: 42 | Toots: 8,238 | Connections: 457 |

    Mastodon Powered by インターネット蟹工船

    対象

    ねれないみんな
    いきるのがつらいみんな
    のんびりしたいみんな
    ねこがすき
    どうぶつがすき
    (どこかの大学の所属ではなくなったみんな)

    ルール

    国内法に基づきます。
    それ以外は基本的に自由です。
    でもサーバに負荷のかかる行為はご遠慮ください。
    みんななかよく

    お問い合わせ先

    Mastodon Powered by インターネット蟹工船は基本的に下記のインターネット蟹工船メンバーが運用しております。
    私たちへの問い合わせは admin(at)nere9.help にお願いします。
    インターネット蟹工船のホームページ

    インターネット蟹工船メンバー一覧(連絡がつき次第ここに増えていきます)

    • ejo090: Mastodon(ここ), Mastodon(ほた鯖), Twitter, 自サイト
    • kuro_milk: Mastodon(ここ)
    • satoshicano: Mastodon(ここ), info
    • mizukmb: Mastodon(ここ), Twitter

    (more)Instance構成

    Application (Docker) さくらのクラウド(TOKYO) vCPU: 2コア RAM: 4GB Storage: 100GB

    Database (Redis) さくらのクラウド(TOKYO) vCPU: 2コア RAM: 4GB Storage: 100GB

    Database (PostgreSQL) Google Cloud Platform(TOKYO) vCPU: 2コア RAM: 6GB Storage: 24GB (Auto Scaling)

    Source Code

    ソースコードは Gitlab よりご参照ください。

    Email: admin@nere9.help

    Admin: @ejo090@mstdn.nere9.help

    A Canadian based Mastodon platform, open to people from everywhere.

    (more)What’s a Moosetodonian? Official Moosetodonians are people from this local instance who are recognized for their contributions to the community. We recognize monetary donations, code contributions, and community participation and support. Supporting This Instance Mastdodon.club is a personally created and funded instance. Your generous donations help support the costs of operating and developing new features, which are growing with the size of our local community. Continued donations as small as $3-5 will help ensure the longevity of our instance.

    Fosspay (official) PayPal.me (alt.) Bitcoin: 39gkNYdkm1u2kUqpkFFAtbjJ4c9MRjvnE5

    A shout-out to Cloud-A Computing for discounting some of the raw infrastructure required to run this community project! It wouldn’t be possible without you. Code of Conduct This instance is for people interacting with other people. Please no corporate shills and direct advertisement. You’ll get yourself banned real fast. Make use of Content Warnings & NSFW tags for appropriate content. Do not mis-use hashtags, they’re not for promoting your products or photography in #introduction or #mastodon. No hate speech (contributing or inciting), death threats, illegal activity, link & local stream spamming, etc. Bots must respect the #nobot hashtag Admin swings ban hammer, rulings final.

    neko.pics (preview)

    | Users: 18 | Toots: 14 | Connections: 17 |

    概要

    ねこが大好きな管理人の立ち上げたmastodon(マストドン）インスタンスです。猫好きが集まると嬉しいにゃん。

    お約束

    • 基本は猫が好きな人が集まるインスタンスです。猫が嫌いな人は参加をお控えください。
    • 喧嘩はやめましょう。
    • Botの使用は特に制限はしません。
    • かわいい猫の写真や動画をどんどんアップしてください。

    みんなが気にしてると思われること

    • 今のところユーザーがいる限り続ける覚悟でやってます。いきなり終了することは無いので安心してね！
    • 個人情報は暗号化されて保存されているから安心してね！
    • 使い方がわからない？そんなの使ってみたらすぐ覚えるよ！

    (more)ねこが大好きな管理人の立ち上げたmastodon(マストドン）インスタンスです。猫好き集まれ！目指せ、猫インスタンス日本一！

    Email: mastdon@neko.pics

    vocalomakets.jp (preview)

    | Users: 113 | Toots: 453 | Connections: 75 |

    「結月ゆかり」を企画したボカロP集団「VOCALOMAKETS」が運営するMastodonです。「結月ゆかり」に関する情報発信・情報交換・交流などを目的として立ち上げました。

    ※ 登録の確認メールが届かない場合は、迷惑メールに振り分けられないように「vocalomakets.jp」ドメインの受信を許可してください。

    (more)お断り

    主な目的は「結月ゆかり」を中心に公式からの情報発信、皆様からのご意見や情報の収集、そして交流の場として使用できればと考えております。 法律に違反するようなご使用、サーバーに過度の負担がかかるご使用はご遠慮ください。 18禁になりそうな内容には「Content Warning」タグを、画像には「NSFW」タグを付けてください。 当サイトをご使用することによって生じた損害などに関して、申し訳ございませんが一切の責任は負えません。 サーバー運営は全くの初心者ですので、不慣れな点もございますが、何卒ご容赦いただけますと幸いです。 上記内容は予告なく変更されることがありますことをご了承ください。

    （更新日：2017年04月27日）

    結月ゆかりについて 7名のボカロP集団「VOCALOMAKETS」による企画、株式会社AHSによる制作・販売で生まれた音声合成ソフトです。しっかりとしたきれいな歌声を持つ女性をベースに製作した「VOCALOID4 結月ゆかり」、大人の女性の情感あふれる声をベースとした入力文字読み上げソフト「VOICEROID2 結月ゆかり」、追加音声の「exVOICE」とバリエーション豊かなライブラリとなっております。

    VOCALOID4　結月ゆかり｜製品情報｜AHS(AH-Software) VOICEROID2 結月ゆかり｜製品情報｜AHS(AH-Software)

    VOCALOMAKETSについて 「何かワクワクするような、面白い事」をしたいボカロPの集まりです。ボカロPが作るVOCALOIDのために集まりましたが、これに限らず今後も面白い事をしていきたいと思っています。

    VOCALOMAKETS / ボカロマケッツ 公式サイト VOCALOMAKETS blog | VOCALOMAKETSおよびそのメンバーの動向を紹介するブログ

    Email: contact@vocalomakets.com

    Admin: @bumpyurushi@vocalomakets.jp

    bne.social (preview)

    | Users: 102 | Toots: 1,540 | Connections: 808 |

    The Brisbane Social Mastodon server. Hosted in sunny Brisbane, for users from and interested in southeast Queensland.

    (more)This site is intended to be a pleasant space for folks to enjoy Mastodon. This instance is run out of Brisbane, Australia to allow faster access for locals. Instance rules The rules of this server are:

    Be respectful of your peers Abide by local and international laws Have fun

    If you have concerns about a person’s conduct, please report the toot in question or get in touch with @ashkyd.

    Blocked instances As with other servers, we have blocked a number of instances that don’t meet our standards for a number of reasons. At this time, we are keeping in step with the toot.cafe blocklist.If this is something that concerns you, please feel free to sign up for another instance. Get started by signing up or logging in, then toot using the #introduction hashtag to say hi!
