    mastodon.mit.edu (preview)

    | Users: 361 | Toots: 2,539 | Connections: 404 |

    mastodon.mit.edu

    (more)mastodon.mit.edu is a Mastodon instance for the MIT community. Anyone with an @mit.edu or @*.mit.edu email address can create an account and participate in the global Mastodon fediverse. Content posted on this instance does not reflect the opinions or policies of MIT. Content Guidelines The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.mit.edu; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism Sexism or advocation of sexism Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism Content in violation of US law

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person’s demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user’s access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: mastodon@mit.edu

    Admin: @mastodon@mastodon.mit.edu

    clacks.link (preview)

    | Users: 6 | Toots: 132 | Connections: 237 |

    Welcome to The Clacks

    Named after the transcontinental communications network from Terry Pratchett’s Discworld.

    (more)Welcome to the Clacks. I created this instance for my own use, and perhaps my friends if they are interested. I have decided to keep signups open for now, but will close them down if it becomes an issue. Follow @tithonium for status updates, planned downtimes, upgrade announcements, etc. If this instance gets busy enough, I’ll probably create a separate account so you don’t have to follow my other nonsense. Also: I tend to run against the master branch, and update when I remember to. Bugs happen. Rule Overview Most of the rules boil down to:

    Don’t be a dick Don’t get me in trouble with the law or my network provider Don’t embarrass me in front of the other Mastodon admins You’re literally in my house; Don’t give me a reason to kick you out

    The Clacks is hosted on a physical server owned by me, @tithonium, located in my office at home, on my own internet connection. When it comes down to it, you are in my home and I decide if you get to be here. If you cause problems, I will deal with you based on my perception of the severity. This could be anywhere from [telling you to knock it off] up to [deleting your account and everything associated with it, blocking your IPs at the firewall, and reporting you to your ISP and law enforcement]. Please don’t make me do the latter. Seriously. I will try to avoid blocking /entire/ instances, but will do so when necessary. If and when I do start blocking users or instances at a site level, I will try to remember to maintain a list here. I will also try to remember to announce when I change these rules. But I’ve also included a revision date down at the bottom. Finally: I’d love to switch out the default Mastodon images and such for something more thematically appropriate, if any artists would be willing to help out for the pittance I can justify spending on this project.

    Some Specific Rules (lifted from other Mastodon instances) The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of clacks.link; they are here to provide you with an insight into my content moderation policies: Please report violations of these rules by local users as needed. This site is not responsible for, and has little control over, the actions and content of users of other federated sites. That said, if a non-local user is a problem, please do let us know about that too, so we can decide how we need to handle it.

    The following types of accounts are disallowed:

    RSS-feed bots not connected to feeds of a Clacks user. Commercial/Advertising accounts Parody accounts

    In addition, accounts that go unverified or unused for a long period will be suspended.


The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources Untagged or Excessive advertising Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence Misinformation for a purpose other than to entertain

    My rules about NSFW-tagging-required may change in the future, I’m not entirely sold on it.

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism Sexism or advocation of sexism Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children Nazi symbolism, for purposes other than analysis or commentary Confederate symbolism, for purposes other than analysis or commentary Content illegal in the state of Washington

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed in bios and avatars:

    Sexual content of any sort Violent content of any sort Images that flash or change rapidly

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person’s demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user’s access permissions, at any time, for any reason. Last Revision: 2017-05-06

    Email: admin@clacks.link

    Admin: @tithonium@clacks.link

    wsup.social (preview)

    | Users: 43 | Toots: 147 | Connections: 179 |

    Wsup!

    wsup.social is one of a myriad of Mastodon instances in the fediverse. We are currently open to registrations. Welcome!

    (more)This is a Mastodon instance in the cloud. Anyone is free to join, as long as the person is not a jerk. Support with Ethereum: 0x4E141d663498B9f0F77E952633115e24e3F75a57or with Bitcoin: 19oNEzUyfLLkKCWV9Vxjti5wCcTVwsVjfT The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of wsup.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism Sexism or advocation of sexism Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person’s demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of this service reserves the right to revoke any user’s access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law. Like all things in life, the longevity of this instance is not guaranteed. Efforts will be made to support and keep this instance alive should things go wrong or it grows beyond initial forecasted capabilities, but use of this service means acceptance of the above statements.

    Email: dm@wsup.social

    Admin: @denmojo@wsup.social

    framapiaf.org (preview)

    | Users: 2,586 | Toots: 55,643 | Connections: 940 |

    framapiaf.org

    (more)Conditions d'utilisation Version courte (TL;DR comme on dit chez nous) (version longue) On est sympathiques :

    Votre contenu vous appartient (mais nous vous encourageons à le publier sous licence libre) ; Framasoft n’exploitera pas vos données personnelles, sauf à fin de statistiques internes (anonymisées) ou pour vous prévenir d’un changement important sur le service ; Framasoft ne transmettra ni ne revendra vos données personnelles (votre vie privée nous tient - vraiment - à cœur) ; Les engagements de Framasoft résultent d’une démarche militante inspirée du mouvement de l’éducation populaire, vous pouvez les retrouver dans notre Charte des services Libres, Ethiques, Décentralisés et Solidaires.

    Mais il ne faut pas nous prendre pour autant pour des chatons :

    « La loi est la loi, et on ne veut pas finir en taule » Vous devez respecter la loi (que celle-ci soit bien faite ou idiote), sinon votre compte sera supprimé

    « Merci d’être poli et respectueux avec ses voisins de service » Vous devez respecter les autres utilisateurs en faisant preuve de civisme et de politesse, sinon votre contenu, voire votre compte, pourront être supprimés, sans négociation

    « Si ça casse, on n’est pas obligé de réparer » Framasoft propose ce service gratuitement et librement. Si vous perdez des données, par votre faute ou par la nôtre, désolé, mais ça arrive. Nous ferons ce que nous pouvons pour les récupérer, mais nous ne nous assignons aucune obligation de résultat. En clair, évitez de mettre des données sensibles ou importantes sur les services Framasoft, car en cas de perte, nous ne garantissons pas leur récupération

    « Si vous n’êtes pas contents, vous êtes invités à aller voir ailleurs » Si le service ne vous convient pas, libre à vous d’en trouver un équivalent (ou meilleur) ailleurs, ou de monter le vôtre

    « Tout abus sera puni » Si un utilisateur abuse du service, par exemple en monopolisant des ressources machines partagées, ou en publiant des contenus considérés comme non pertinents, son contenu ou son compte pourra être supprimé sans avertissement ni négociation. Framasoft reste seul juge de cette notion « d’abus » dans le but de fournir le meilleur service possible à l’ensemble de ses utilisateurs. Si cela vous parait anti-démocratique, anti-libriste, anti-liberté-d’expression, merci de vous référer à la clause précédente

    « Rien n’est éternel » Les services peuvent fermer (faute de fonds pour les maintenir, par exemple), ils peuvent être victimes d’intrusion (le « 100 % sécurisé » n’existe pas). Nous vous encourageons donc à conserver une copie des données qui vous importent, car Framasoft ne saurait être tenu pour responsable de leur hébergement sans limite de temps

    Email: https://contact.framasoft.org

    Admin: @Framasoft@framapiaf.org

    mstdn.techdrive.top (preview)

    | Users: 190 | Toots: 1,323 | Connections: 444 |

    「ソフトウェア技術者の平和なローカルタイムライン」が見たいと思って始めたGitHubアカウントでログインできるインスタンスです。みんなが開発してたり、勉強してたりするのをゆる〜く共有したいです。公開分報してしまって大丈夫です！開発してる今を共有してください。

    そういうのが好きなんですヽ(´ー｀)ノ。

    誰かが困っていたらすこーし助けてあげるくらいの優しさもしくは偽善を求めます。 マサカリは投げずにピコピコハンマーくらいにしてあげてください。

    喧嘩する人は（・∀・）ｶｴﾚ!

    イラっとしたらそっ閉じ。ミュートなども活用しましょうね。

    今Heroku運用なので、なんかヤバくなってきたら引っ越しとかします。一応データ全部吹っ飛ぶとかはしないようにするつもりです。

    メール設定したのと、GitHubでログインすればメアド＆パスワードを設定できるように変えたので、アプリなども利用可能だと思います。もしもうまく動かないなどあったら教えてください。

    (more) 連絡先

    Masashi Sato TECH DRIVE @ms2sato

    ビジネスメールアドレス: ms2sato@techdrive.top

    Email: ms2sato@techdrive.top

    Admin: @ms2sato@mstdn.techdrive.top

    mstdn-bike.net (preview)

    | Users: 95 | Toots: 1,277 | Connections: 235 |

    Mastodon バイク鯖です。
    メーカー・ジャンル問わず、参加者の皆さんがのほほんとバイク談義ができる鯖になることを鯖缶は祈っております。

    (more)ルール

    法律は守ってください。犯罪に加担していそうだったり、日本法に抵触するようなトゥートは禁止です。最悪警察や裁判所の要請に応じてログを開示することになります。 エログロなどの理由で18禁になりそうな文章にはCW:Content Warningを、画像にはNSFWタグを付けてください。例え付けていても日本法に抵触するような画像はダメです。 連投や、フォロ爆などの過度に迷惑がかかる投稿は禁止です。スパムにしか見えないような宣伝とかもやめてね。 みんな仲良く。

    Bot作成ルール

    Bot禁止、Botでのアカウント作成、フォロー、連投、ファボ爆はしないでください。

    お問い合わせ先 お問い合わせは、メール(kuroringo.mstdn.bike(at)gmail.com)にお願いします。

    Email: kuroringo.mstdn.bike@gmail.com

    Admin: @kuroringo@mstdn-bike.net

    mastodon.rocks (preview)

    | Users: 1,680 | Toots: 7,343 | Connections: 828 |

    Because Mastodon rocks !

    (more)English Welcome Here some resources to understand Mastodon :

    Welcome to Mastodon by @Gargron Bye, Twitter. All the cool kids are migrating to Mastodon by Mashable

    Rules

    No illegal content. The server is hosted in France : racism, apology for terrorism, bullying, defamation, violations privacy rights and child pornograhy are illegal under French law. No oppressive content (sexism, homophobia, etc). No parody account. No bot (for the moment). Any graphical content have to contain a Content Warning. No explicit sexual content in the public timeline without content warning (you can configure your toot privacy on “public but do not display on public timeline”).

    Mobile applications

    Android : Tusky iOS : Amaroq for Mastodon Full list

    Support Mastodon

    The code source can be found here : Github You can help the developer of Mastodon on Patreon

    Support this instance mastodon.rocks

    Français Bienvenue Voici quelques ressources pour comprendre Mastodon :

    Welcome to Mastodon par @Alda Découvrez Mastodon, un clone de Twitter libre, open source et décentralisé par @Numerama Le réseau social Mastodon, un « Twitter plus proche de l’esprit originel » par @Willvs (pour Le Monde)

    Règles

    Tout contenu doit respecter la loi relative à l'hébergement de contenu sur Internet. Tout contenu oppressif (sexiste, homophobe, etc.) entraîne un ban. Pas de compte parodique. Bots fortement déconseillés (pour l'instant). Les médias violents doivent obligatoirement être accompagnés d'un Content Warning. Pas de contenu sexuel sans content warning dans la TL publique (il vous suffit de mettre les toots en “public but do not display on public timeline”).

    Applications mobiles

    Android : Tusky iOS : Amaroq for Mastodon La liste complète

    Contribuer à Mastodon

    Le code source est disponible sur Github Vous pouvez aider financièrement le développeur sur Patreon

    Aider cette instance mastodon.rocks

    Email: admin@hackjack.info

    Admin: @HackJack@mastodon.rocks

    soc.ialis.me (preview)

    | Users: 431 | Toots: 9,956 | Connections: 1,029 |

    A generalist Mastodon instance hosted in France.

    Learn about the instance information, guidelines, and the privacy policy.

    (more)A generalist Mastodon instance hosted in France.

    Our guidelines are currently being written ; but basically:

    don’t be a dick, no advertising, harassment, spam, no abuse on the API by local users (bots, …), Any thing illegal under the French law will be removed and reported to the competent authorities.

    Informations and status about the instance is posted to @admin.

    Currently the only human administrating this instance is @href. Other administrators may be added in the future, as I (href) prefer focusing on managing the servers and the underlying infrastructure than people.

    Don’t hesitate to ping either @href or @admin to talk about the instance, create an issue at hrefhref/mastodon on GitHub, or privately at admin (at) soc.ialis.me.

    The instance itself is hosted on servers at Online.net and Scaleway.com, in Paris, France. The database and files are frequently replicated on a couple of servers, and externally backuped.

    The servers are run by an organization (with no legal grounds; entierly privately owned) called random.sh / random labs; which hosts other services such as irc.random.sh, a ChatSpike.net IRC Server, Etherpad.fr, and much more. I also intend to one day make it my own company for some products, but I’ll then separate the business with theses community services (the business will just be a sponsor, and without any advertisement, tracking, or anything else evil).

    soc.ialis.me logo and derivations (not found and errors) by @Famine, license CC BY-NC-SA. The bird escaped, don’t worry. Mastodons aren’t that good at aiming.

    Background image Sunset Landscape Rocks Silhouettes by skeeze, licensed under CC0 Public Domain.

    Email: soc@ialis.me

    Admin: @admin@soc.ialis.me

    amicale.net (preview)

    | Users: 28 | Toots: 409 | Connections: 404 |

    Instance privée de mastodon, auto-hébergée, sans garantie de disponibilité !

    Destinée uniquement aux amis (avec un email xxx@amicale.net)

    Accessible en ipv4, ipv6, http2, https A+… et zéro tracker pour un maximum de respect de votre vie privée.

    (more) Cette instance de mastodon est expérimentale, auto-hébergée et sans garantie de disponibilité !

    Elle est destinée à la famille, aux amis mais aussi aux amoureux de géo, de carto, d'opendata, aux libristes, geeks et makers de tous poils !

    Cette chose tourne sur ma “Tour Infernale”… un Dell T7500 d'occasion (merci ebay) avec plein de coeurs (12) rapides (2 Xeon X5690 donc du 3.5GHz) de la RAM (96Go) des disques qui tournent et un qui tournent pas (oui, on dit “SSD”). Cette engin est connecté à internet via ma ligne VDSL2 (merci free)… donc on est loin d'un beau datacenter mais ça doit faire l'affaire pour quelques dizaines/centaines de comptes !

    Email: cquest@amicale.net

    wmdon.jp (preview)

    | Users: 137 | Toots: 377 | Connections: 199 |

    株式会社ウェブマネーが運営する公式Mastodonインスタンスです。
    スマートフォンゲームやテレビゲーム、オンラインゲームが好きな人、eスポーツに興味がある人など、どなたでもご利用ください。


    ◆ルール

    • 日本の法律の範囲内でご利用ください。
    • 公序良俗に反する内容（文章・画像・動画など）を投稿は禁止いたします。
    • サーバーに対し通常の利用を超えた負荷をかける行為は禁止いたします。
    • 当社が不適切と判断した書き込みがあった場合は予告なく削除またはアカウントの停止を行う場合があります。
    • 試験運用中のため、予告なくメンテナンスやサービスの一時中断・終了となる場合がございます。
    • アカウントの削除はこちらまでご連絡ください。個別で対応いたします。
    • ご入力いただいたメールアドレスは、本サービスを利用するためのみに利用いたします。その他、個人情報の管理については、当社ホームページの「個人情報の取扱い」をご覧ください。

    chaos.social (preview)

    | Users: 588 | Toots: 11,597 | Connections: 845 |

    chaos.social - because anarchy is much more fun with friends.
    chaos.social is a small Mastodon instance for and by the chaos community. We provide a small community space - be excellent to each other (and read the rules if you’re not sure what that means).
    Follow @ordnung for low-traffic instance-related updates.

    (more)Since “Be excellent to each other” is much easier said than done, we have a (non-exhaustive) list of behaviours that may lead to deletion of toots, and silencing or suspension of accounts, if problems persist. In particular, we do not tolerate:

    Harrassment, stalking, doxxing Racism, sexism, verbal abuse or advocation thereof Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof Violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism Contacting people who made clear they want no contact. Dogpiling/brigading Untagged sexual content, gore, or advertisement Untagged, or automated, or excessive advertisement Bots interacting with users without their explicit requests

    Please report behaviour that bothers you. That includes behaviour from other instances - we are very willing stop federating with asshole instances. You can find further information on our instance in our GitHub repository, which also provides a list of currently blocked or silenced instances, alongside with reasons. We (@leah and @rixx) are maintaining this instance on our spare time, hardware and nerves. Don’t push either of those.

    Email: contact@chaos.social

    Admin: @ordnung@chaos.social

    mel.social (preview)

    | Users: 9 | Toots: 40 | Connections: 131 |

    mel.social is a small mastodon instance aimed primarily at Melbourne and Victoria based people who want a safe digital space to communicate and be creative. members are encouraged to communication and share their work as long as it adheres to our Code of Conduct

    Please make sure you’ve familiarised yourself with our Code of Conduct before signing up and if our rules aren’t to your liking then there are many other instances that may be better suited to your needs.

    Follow @status for status & maintenance updates. Instance admin is @ajfisher

    (more)mel.social Code of Conduct As a user of mel.social, you agree to uphold an environment of respect and empathy for all users. Any conduct that is deemed oppressive is grounds for removal from mel.social. Any language or action that expresses, reinforces, upholds or sympathises with any form of systemic social domination is considered oppressive and is grounds for removal at any level deemed appropriate by the Admin. Pornography, violence, and fast-blinking images/content should not be used as a profile photo and should always be posted with a “NSFW” tag/content warning. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in a ban from mel.social:

    Unapproved bots (for approval, please contact @ajfisher) Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content Untagged gore and graphic violence Racism or advocation of racism Sexism or advocation of sexism Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in a ban from mel.social:

    Sexual depictions of children Holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism Promoting the oppression of any group based on gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, or nationality.

    Any conduct intended to stalk, harass, or intimidate other users, or to impede other users from utilising the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions is forbidden and subject to punishment up to and including a ban from mel.social. This can include, but is not limited to, the following behaviours:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person’s demographic, personal, or private data without express permission. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment. Posting and/or disseminating a person’s posts (“toots”), including screen captures or any other content without express permission. Intentionally posting or disseminating libel, slander, or other disinformation. This Code of Conduct applies both to content on mel.social and to public spaces when an individual is representing mel.social or its community. Reports of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behaviour may be made by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and dealt with as soon as possible. Admins are obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident. The Admin reserves the right to revoke any user’s content on or access to mel.social, at any time, for any reason.

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @ajfisher@mel.social

    bapp.me (preview)

    | Users: 121 | Toots: 199 | Connections: 431 |

    Welcome! Feel free to make an account and use this instance. I promise to keep it running if any users show up, at most I will close registration in the unlikely event that it gets too big for me to financially support.

    (more)Registration is open unless it becomes a problem. Running on a 2CPU/2GB RAM droplet for now, will increase it if necessary (probably not past 50€/month or so but I might consider cheap colo hosting instead if it comes to that). Rules:

    No content promoting racism, sexism, xenophobia, homophobia or nazis allowed (and if your content skirts these categories then think twice before posting). I prefer restorative justice where possible but offending content will be removed, and continued toxicity results in a ban.

    Still pretty new to this whole thing and I set everything up manually instead of using a docker image as a learning experience so some things might be broken.

    Email: atbaaba@gmail.com

    Admin: @anttirt@bapp.me

    anti.energy (preview)

    | Users: 53 | Toots: 1,284 | Connections: 640 |

    NO. FUCKING. NAZIS.

    (more)This instance tracks https://github.com/d3vgru/mastodon which is a dev fork of Mastodon so it might not be like totally stable or anything. I am fairly anti-instance-block. I reserve the right but I’d really rather let users make their own sense of it. This particular instance should be considered experimental. I am currently tracking Mastodon releases but reserve the right to apply my own changes to the code and deploy them at any time. An example would be if an instance were making undue demands on resources and I found a way to throttle them without blocking. I want to replace the backend with a pure node API I am writing, then replace the web UI with something a little more my style. ReactJS? I dunno we’ll see what’s cool in 6 months. VueJS and Quasar. Trying to figure out the best way to let users still load the Mastodon UI if they like it. If I can get the new UI working, I’d like to add P2P capabilities so these networks can run more like torrent sharing and less like downloading from a server.

    Email: superbranch@riseup.net

    Admin: @superbranch@anti.energy

    m.massy.city (preview)

    | Users: 12 | Toots: 148 | Connections: 364 |

    Une instance Mastodon dédiée aux habitants de Massy (91) en France, tenue à jour et fournie par StrangeBlackHole SAS une entreprise Massicoise. Hébergée en France, l'un de ses objectif premier est la transparence mais aussi de fournir un outil de réseautage local et des services associés. La modération est collaborative, n’hésitez surtout pas à rapporter tout contenu problématique !

    Cette instance n'a aucun lien avec la municipalité et ne dépend d'aucun parti politique ou courant de pensée. Elle sera ce que vous en ferez.

    (more)Quelques règles Sur cette instance les règles sont simples. Aucun sexisme, racisme, homophobie, âgisme, grossophobie ou psychophobie, etc… n’est toléré. Tout message de haine est proscrit, les fascistes et leurs copains nazis, les fous de dieu intégristes en tout genre sont directement bannis. La publication de contenu pornographique non désigné comme tel avec un “Content Warning” (CW) mènent aussi à une exclusion du serveur. Cette instance Mastodon se veut inclusive et bienveillante, ainsi nous bannirons sans prévenir et sans regret. Les comptes bannis ne sont plus accessibles depuis notre instance, vous ne pouvez plus voir leur contenu ni les suivre. Nous encourageons nos utilisateur-ice-s à utiliser la fonction de rapport (“Report”) pour nous faire part du contenu et/ou des comptes allant à l’encontre de nos règles. D'ailleurs si celles-ci ne vous conviennent pas, ne râlez pas, trouvez simplement un autre serveur. Notre réseau social, et son réseau entier selon nous, est dédié à la réappropriation des moyens de communication et à la création de communautés meilleures pour le collectif. Les catégories de personnes citées dans le paragraphe précédent n'oeuvrant pas du tout (allant même dans le sens contraire) à la réalisation de ces objectifs, elles sont logiquement pas les bienvenues. Merci de rapporter leur présence si vous les croisez sur notre serveur. Ces règles sont inspirées par celles écrites pour l'instance unixcorn, merci à eux.

    Email: contact@massy.city

    Admin: @fabrice@m.massy.city

    mstdn.pw (preview)

    | Users: 15 | Toots: 28 | Connections: 111 |

    mstdn.pw is a Mastodon instance that promotes healthy and open expression of individuals, ideas, and content. As you would expect, free speech is encouraged and viewed in high regard as is open discussion, spanning a multitude of viewpoints and among all users.

    (more)There are few rules here as we operate on the assumption that most users are not malicious in intent. Rules:

    Illegal content - no illegal content is allowed, including but not limited to underage content with the depiction of minors in any sexual context. Non-consent - no content depicting anyone being forced against their will for entertainment. Exceptions include videos on real world events that have a societal impact. This content should help raise awareness and educate, and stir up healthy discussions. Harassment - discussion, including disagreements, are encouraged, but harassment of other users is prohibited. We are defining harassment as: anything intending to incite others and elicit negative emotions and reactions from other users while not contributing to worthwhile discussion. Having one’s feelings hurt and being offended by another user’s opinions and world views does not constitute harassment. When in doubt, follow this piece of advice: Don’t be a dick. Circumventing blocks/suspensions - this is a great way to be removed from the instance. If someone blocks you, just leave it be. Going around the blocks to engage someone is harassment.

    Considerations Do keep in mind that we are part of a community. Please be considerate of others and use the CW and NSFW flags for content warranting it. However, this is not a requirement, and content will NOT be removed for disregarding this request. Personal Responsibility You’re responsible for your content, the content you view, and your interactions with other users. This platform gives great granular support to each individual user and instance alike. Please make yourself familiar with the controls if you are not familiar with them already. If you want content tailored to your liking, we’re not sure this is the place for you, but you are allowed and encouraged to follow, unfollow, block, and unblock users as you see fit. We don’t expect everybody will along all the time, so use these functions as you please. You control the flow of the information you see. You’re responsible for what you toot, boost, and favorite. Nobody will warn you when you get too close to the line and stop you before you cross it. We will work on the assumption that you were raised as part of a community, so we expect you know how to act alongside others. If you lack social skills or just want guidance, feel free to contact our admins for information. If you feel like you’re getting too emotionally involved, allowing yourself to be distracted from work or from spending time with loved ones, know when to walk away. Nobody else knows your limit better than you do.

    Email: jake@eightsix.in

    Admin: @jake@mstdn.pw

    ngndn.jp (preview)

    | Users: 36 | Toots: 474 | Connections: 61 |

    信州長野県出身のひと、いま住んでいるひと、興味のあるひとどなたでも自由に参加いただいて、たのしくおはなししましょうというマストドンです。

    (more)おやくそく

    信州長野県がテーマですが、それに限らず雑談しましょう 法令遵守でおねがいします。場合によっては警察や裁判所の要請に応じてログを開示する可能性もあります 基本的には公序良俗の範疇で。あんまし小学生とかに適切でないかも？という文章は CW (Content Warning) を、画像には NSFW (Not suitable for work;職場閲覧不適切) をつけましょう。つけても法にふれるようなのはダメです これらの問題がある場合、運営者の独断で予告なく削除やアカウント停止を行うこともあります 本サービスを利用することによって被害・損失があった場合、運営者は保証できません と、いちおー硬いことを書きましたが、みんな仲良くやりましょう

    運営者およびお問い合わせ先

    このインスタンスは長野県マストドン協会によって運営されています。お問い合わせは @nagano または E-mail ngndn.jp(at)gmail.com まで。反応遅かったらごめんなさい。

    @nagano からおしらせとかもするかもしれないので、念のためフォローしておいていてくださいね。

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @nagano@ngndn.jp

    mastodon.swordlogic.com (preview)

    | Users: 138 | Toots: 1,102 | Connections: 4 |

    DMMオンラインゲーム「しんけん!!」ファンの皆様のためのインスタンスです。 公式ページはこちら

    ご登録の際には認証メールが送信されます。送信元ドメイン @mastodon.swordlogic.com からのメールを受信できるように設定をご確認ください。

    (more)ご利用にあたって このインスタンスは「しんけん!!」ファンの楽しい交流の場としてお使いください。 ネタバレなど他のユーザーへの配慮が必要な投稿を行う際は、テキストなら「CW」（Contents Warning：内容についての警告〜表題は指定可能）、画像ならアップロード後に「NSFW」（Not Safe For Work：職場や公共の場所での閲覧には不向き）ボタンをお使いください。

    禁止行為について

    全般的には皆様の良識にお任せしますが、以下の事項については禁止いたします。

    日本の法律で禁止されている行為 公序良俗に反する行為 実在する個人や団体になりすます行為 特定の個人や団体の名誉を棄損したり脅迫や損害を与える行為 他者の著作権を侵害する行為 サーバーに過度の負荷をかける行為やスパム行為

    「しんけん!!」とは

    プロローグ

    ある日突如として飛来した隕石群『大天狗』によって甚大なる被害を受けた日本。 飛散した隕石のかけらから生まれた謎の生命体『憑喪』が残った都市を蹂躙、エネルギーと名のつく全てのものを食い荒らし、遂には人々の命にも手をかけ始めた。 憑喪に対して我々はまったくの無力だったが、とある神社に奉納されていた神刀が憑喪に有効だったという報告が反撃の糸口となる。 発掘された古文書から、特殊な鍛えられ方をした刀剣には憑喪に対抗しうる力が宿るのだとわかり、研究の結果、秘伝の鍛刀法の再現に至った。 人類の存亡を賭けよみがえる数々の名刀と、名刀に魅入られし真剣少女達の物語がいま始まる!!

    DMMオンラインゲーム「しんけん!!」

    http://pc-play.games.dmm.com/play/shinken/ ©2015 DMM.com POWERCHORD STUDIO Development by studio PROSPECT / PICOGRAPH

    このインスタンスに関するお問い合わせ先

    studio PROSPECT   @studioprospect e-mail: info@studio-prospect.jp

    Email: info@studio-prospect.jp

    Admin: @studioprospect@mastodon.swordlogic.com

    mastodon.org.uk (preview)

    | Users: 240 | Toots: 5,697 | Connections: 930 |

    Statistics

    How does it work? When you create an account on Mastodon, you create an account on the website you currently are visiting. For example, here you are on mastodon.org.uk. That is your instance.

    You will notice after log in two different timelines, the Local and the Federated.
    The local timeline is all the public toots of all our local users ( the one who registered on mastodon.org.uk and use it to access the Mastodon federation ).
    The federated timeline adds the public toots of all the users that our local users are following in other servers/

    Need to know users
    @xvilo Is the maintainer of this instance.
    @STATUS Gives you information about this instance.
    @userscount Gives us detailed info about users and toots.

    Bots on this instance
    @STATUS Gives us an automated heads up when there is a new Mastodon Version available.
    @userscount Gives us detailed info about users and toots. Source on Github
    @bigben Toots the time. Source on Github. Maintained by @followthesam

    Bots are welcome here but please not that bots will be silenced when posting too much (e.g. flooding local timeline). If you have a bot, please contact me (@xvilo). I can add it to the list.
    Bots will be banned if they post inappropriate content or if I (@xvilo) get many complaints about it.

    (more)Blocks Pawoo.net - Silenced

    Email: sem@tropical.email

    Admin: @xvilo@mastodon.org.uk

    muhroads.party (preview)

    | Users: 16 | Toots: 155 | Connections: 161 |

    muhroads.party is a liberty-minded Mastodon instance with free speech being highly valued in order to promote free, open discussion among users of all backgrounds and viewpoints, refusing to sacrifice free expression in order to protect sensitivities. As a result, moderation will be very limited in scope. We welcome you. Taxation is theft.

    (more)There are few rules here as we operate on the assumption that most users are not malicious in intent. Rules:

    Illegal content - no illegal content is allowed, including but not limited to underage content with the depiction of minors in any sexual context. Non-consent - no content depicting anyone being forced against their will for entertainment. Exceptions include videos on real world events that have a societal impact. This content should help raise awareness and educate, and stir up healthy discussions. Harassment - discussion, including disagreements, are encouraged, but harassment of other users is prohibited. We are defining harassment as: anything intending to incite others and elicit negative emotions and reactions from other users while not contributing to worthwhile discussion. Having one’s feelings hurt and being offended by another user’s opinions and world views does not constitute harassment. When in doubt, follow this piece of advice: Don’t be a dick. Circumventing blocks/suspensions - this is a great way to be removed from the instance. If someone blocks you, just leave it be. Going around the blocks to engage someone is harassment.

    Considerations Do keep in mind that we are part of a community. Please be considerate of others and use the CW and NSFW flags for content warranting it. However, this is not a requirement, and content will NOT be removed for disregarding this request. Personal Responsibility You’re responsible for your content, the content you view, and your interactions with other users. This platform gives great granular support to each individual user and instance alike. Please make yourself familiar with the controls if you are not familiar with them already. If you want content tailored to your liking, we’re not sure this is the place for you, but you are allowed and encouraged to follow, unfollow, block, and unblock users as you see fit. We don’t expect everybody will along all the time, so use these functions as you please. You control the flow of the information you see. You’re responsible for what you toot, boost, and favorite. Nobody will warn you when you get too close to the line and stop you before you cross it. We will work on the assumption that you were raised as part of a community, so we expect you know how to act alongside others. If you lack social skills or just want guidance, feel free to contact our admins for information. If you feel like you’re getting too emotionally involved, allowing yourself to be distracted from work or from spending time with loved ones, know when to walk away. Nobody else knows your limit better than you do.

    Email: jake@eightsix.in

    Admin: @jake@muhroads.party

    myfreckle.com (preview)

    | Users: 66 | Toots: 110 | Connections: 197 |

    myfreckle.com

    (more)About myfreckle.com: We believe Social Media is changing the world.

    This instance is for people who are fascinated with and enjoy being part of the change that Social Media is bringing.

    This instance has been set-up and continues to be maintained by professional developers. This instance is hosted on Amazon AWS infrastructure. We realise dependable infrastructure is important for a Social Media network to remain useful. The following guidelines are not a legal document, and the final interpretation is up to the administration of myfreckle.com; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies: General Rules and Guidelines

    Be nice to each other. Use common sense. Corporate accounts are welcome, but don’t overdo the posting and no direct advertising. Parody accounts are fine (identify your account as a parody), impersonation of others is not allowed. Bots are not allowed to post to the public timeline unless permission has been received from an admin. Automated posting is not allowed unless permission has been received from an admin. Content / behaviour that is illegal in the United States of America, Canada, France, Germany, United Kingdom or Australia is not permitted on this instance. Breach of this will result in a permanent ban of the account.

    The following content will be removed from the timeline and will get your account permanently banned:

    Racism or advocation of racism Sexism or advocation of sexism Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism Pornography and sexually explicit content Gore and extremely graphic violence

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person’s demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment. The administrators reserves the right of admission to this instance and the right to change the above from time to time except where limited by law.

    If there are any comments, questions please email the admins at freckle@myfreckle.com - please be patient as a response may take some time.

    Email: freckle@myfreckle.com

    Admin: Not Available

    mstdn.niigata.jp (preview)

    | Users: 44 | Toots: 3,615 | Connections: 144 |

    日本 新潟県某所に設置してあるmastodonインスタンスです。
    新潟県民以外も参加歓迎します。

    ルール

    • 法律は厳守して下さい。
    • 法律に加担・接触するようなトゥートの投稿は禁止
    • R-18指定(エロ・グロ等)は、文章にはContent Warningを，画像にはNSFWタグを付けてください。
    • 連投やフォローバックなど過度な迷惑投稿は禁止です。
    • スパムにしか見えない宣伝やトゥートは禁止
    • みんな仲良く楽しみましょう

    禁止事項

    • 本サービスのサーバーまたはネットワークの機能を破壊したり，妨害したりする行為
    • 他のユーザーに成りすます行為
    • 当インスタンスの他のユーザーまたは第三者の知的財産権，肖像権，プライバシー，名誉その他の権利または利益を侵害する行為
    • 宗教活動または宗教団体への勧誘行為
    • その他，運営チームが不適切と判断する行為

    (more)mastodon 新潟サーバー作った理由 mstdn.jpの補助として作ろうと構築し始めました。 ちなみに新潟の理由は、サーバーを借りてる所が新潟県にあるからです。 提供

    サーバーハード管理：hiroponさん

    留意事項

    当インスタンスは重大な損害を与える可能性があるインスタンスについてはBANさせていただきます。（例：パスワード抜き取るインスタンス） 原則、法律に反して警察・裁判所・弁護士から要請が来た場合、該当ユーザーのログを開示させていただきます。

    寄付 もし宜しければEntyで支援をお願いします。 お問い合わせ mastodon：@mamireimu@mstdn.niigata.jp Twitter:@anilove_mami_13 or @mstdn_niigata

    Email: mamireimu@mamireimuserver.com

    Admin: @mamireimu@mstdn.niigata.jp

    m.sl-network.fr (preview)

    | Users: 46 | Toots: 1,544 | Connections: 479 |

    Instance Mastodon SL-Network Inscriptions libres, rejoignez-nous !

    (more)Règles de l'instance :

    Cette instance est auto-gérée, ce qui veut dire que l'admin ne décide pas du contenu qui peut ou ne peut pas y apparaître.

    Seuls les utilisateurs peuvent rendre muet ou bloquer d'autres utilisateurs sur leur compte, aucun blocage complet ne sera fait par l'admin Tous les signalements (sauf réquisition judiciaire des autorités compétentes) seront donc simplement ignorés.

    Nous ne sommes pas hébergeurs ni fournisseur de contenu, nous mettons simplement à disposition une plateforme d'échange et de discussion via un réseau social.

    Si ces règles ne vous conviennent pas vous êtes libres de vous inscrire sur une autre instance qui est plus en adéquation avec votre philosophie. Vous en trouverez une liste sur https://instances.mastodon.xyz.

    Si vous pensez qu'il faut faire évoluer ces règles je suis ouvert à toute suggestion évidemment. Merci de privilégier le mail pour tout contact “important” : myckeul@sl-network.fr

    Email: myckeul@sl-network.fr

    Admin: @myckeul@m.sl-network.fr

    Tout compte créé ici pourra a priori discuter avec l'ensemble des autres instances de Mastodon de la fédération, et sera visible sur les autres instances.
    Nous maintiendrons cette instance sur le long terme, et gèrerons le matériel pour que cela tienne en fonction de l'activité des utilisateurs.

    mastodon.crypt.lol (preview)

    | Users: 6 | Toots: 12 | Connections: 64 |

    (more)Bienvenu sur l'instance mastodon du domaine crypt.lol.

    Les inscriptions sont actuellement ouvertes, n'hésitez pas à nous rejoindre.

    < Règles >

    Nous n'imposons aucune règle particulière en matière d'expression et demandons simplement de faire preuve de bon sens. Nous ne tolérons donc aucun message raciste, sexiste, xénophobe, …, sur les timelines public ou local. Le non-respect de cette (simple) règle entraînera un ban et une suppression immédiate de votre compte. Libre à vous d'exprimer les idées les plus nauséabondes qui soient tant que celles-ci restent privées.

    Pour le reste, vos publications sont de votre responsabilité.

    Toute forme de menace, harcèlement, chantage, …, envers un autre utilisateur.trice du fediverse est également proscrite et sera sanctionnée au minima d'une suppression de votre compte.

    < Infos >

    Le serveur est hébergé en France sur le réseau d'Iliad. Nous accordons de l'importance au respect de la vie privée et les disques durs sont donc chiffrés. Plus d'infos ici.

    Activistes/militants ? Utilisez tor.

    < Admin >

    Administrateurs.trices d'une instance ? En cas de problème, vous pouvez contacter le compte @Pachy ou utiliser l'addresse mail présente sur cette page. Vous pouvez également contacter @Neph ou @Diagamma si vous n'obtenez pas de réponses suffisamment rapidement.

    Email: pachyderme@crypt.lol

    Admin: @Pachy@mastodon.crypt.lol

    physi.cc (preview)

    | Users: 38 | Toots: 1,600 | Connections: 684 |

    Mastodon is a distributed, open-source social platform. This instance is run by a graduate worker and physics PhD candidate in Ithaca NY, but can be used to connect with people on any other GNU Social compatible instance. There are no formal rules on this instance for now, just don’t be a jerk! We reserve the right to keep anything and anyone bad off the server.

    eu1.mastoburn.com (preview)

    | Users: 44 | Toots: 1,055 | Connections: 441 |

    [FR]

    Bienvenue sur MastoBurn !

    Les inscriptions sont ouverte.

    Cette instance possède la dernière version stable de Mastodon V1.3.3(08/05/2017 11h30)

    Cette instance sera maintenue sur le long terme.

    Cette instance est administrée par des passionnés de serveur et du Self-hosting, qui passe tous leurs temps libres à avaler de la documentation. Cette instance a pour but de contribuer au développement de Mastodon, réseau social Décentralisé.

    N'hésitez pas à nous rejoindre et à partager l'instance Mastoburn à tous vos amis

    Pour toutes questions sur notre instance contact@mastoburn.com

    [EN]

    Welcome to MastoBurn !

    The sign up is open.

    This Mastodon is administered by enthusiasts of server technology and self-hosting solution, who spends all their free time to eat linux documentation.

    This Mastodon will be maintained over the long term.

    Feel free to join us and share the Mastoburn instance to all your friends

    For any questions about our instance contact@mastoburn.com

    (more)[FR] Règles de MastoBurn:

    Pas de SPAM/FLOOD. Pas de propos, ni de contenus média Racist, sexist, homophobic, pédopornographique etc … Le contenu non adapté à un public jeune (-18 ans) sont autorisé mais doivent êtres balisées de manière responsable en “Content Warning” (CW) / NFSW Pas Pub sauf si accord des Admins. L'Anglais, L'Américain et toutes les langues de l'Union Européenne sont autorisé sur cette instance.

    ⚡Règlement en construction⚡ 👮S'il vous semble qu'un utilisateur de MastoBurn ne respecte pas une règle énoncée ci-dessus, je vous invite à signaler le Pouet en question. Administrateurs et comptes officiel MastoBurn:

    @Lazarik Administrateur Mastoburn @Ronybeck Administrateur Mastoburn @BurnStats Bot qui génère des statistique de l'instance Mastoburn @TechBurn Compte technique de Mastoburn (annonce maj, maintenance, etc…)

    Info technique de MastoBurn:

    Le serveur est un Dédié hébergé au Pays-Bas CPU 8C/8T @2.4 Ghz RAM 16 Go DDR3 SSD 250 Go, les fichiers média sont actuellement stockés sur notre SSD, Nous passerons dans peut de temps sur AS3 pour les fichiers média. Network 2.5 Gbit/sec

    [EN] Rules of MastoBurn: ⚡Description under construction⚡

    Email: contact@mastoburn.com

    Admin: @Lazarik@eu1.mastoburn.com

    talker.to (preview)

    | Users: 69 | Toots: 111 | Connections: 308 |

      A secure XMPP, Mumble and Mastodon Server.

      / XMPP In-band registration is enabled.
      / Server location: EU-Germany
      / Webserver: Nginx
      / Mastodon: 1.2
      / XMPP: Prosody 0.9.12
      / Mumble: 1.2.12

    (more)

    Suspended & Silenced Servers

    Silenced:

    pawoo.net –> because of alot illegal media content Suspended: none so far –> shitposter.club is on the radar, because it is blocked on many other mastodon instances

    Silence will make the account’s posts invisible to anyone who isn’t following them. Suspend will remove all of the account’s content, media, and profile data.

    TALKER.TO Rules

    This information is taken from mastodon.social and edited to match the needs of TALKER.TO

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of TALKER.TO; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism Sexism or advocation of sexism Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children Content illegal in Germany, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service.

    This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person’s demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user’s access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law. #

    Email: admin@talker.to

    Admin: @dan@talker.to

    wizfox.jp (preview)

    | Users: 14 | Toots: 79 | Connections: 82 |

    wizfox.jpはWizFoxが個人で運営するMastodonインスタンスです。
    ジャンルなどの決まりもなく、どなたでも登録可能、好きな形で利用できます。

    ただし、当然ですが法律および公序良俗に反する行為は処罰の対象となります。

    (more)wizfox.jpのサーバーは管理者個人のお財布から運営資金が捻出されています。 そのため、ユーザー数の増加に対してサーバーの増強が追いつかなくなり重たくなる可能性がありますのでご了承ください。

    なお、サーバーはConoHa VPSおよびGoogle Cloud Storageにより運用されています。 ご興味のある方は管理者まで直接お声かけください。

    管理者 Mastodon: @WizFox@wizfox.jp Twitter : @WizFox Mail : social@wizfox.org

    Email: social@wizfox.org

    Admin: @WizFox@wizfox.jp

    gundam.masto.host (preview)

    | Users: 22 | Toots: 466 | Connections: 176 |

    SIDE7とは
     ここは機動戦士ガンダムシリーズ好きが集まるMastodonです。
    初代から最新作まで時代と世代を超えて語り合いましょう。
    アニメに限らずガンダムの話題であればどの媒体の話でもOKです。
    This is Mastodon where Mobile Suit Gundam series fans gather.
    Let’s talk over time and generations from original work to latest work.

    (more) サーバー

    このサーバーはhttps://masto.host/上で稼動しています。

    現在100人程度を収容可能な体制で運用していますが、今後の状況次第では拡張する可能性があります。そして同時に(無いとは思いますが)予告無く閉鎖する可能性もありますので、データのエクスポートは定期的にお願いします。

    ルール

    ・法律に反する内容の投稿 ・宣伝行為(営利・非営利不問) ・鯖内の風紀を著しく乱す誹謗中傷 ・その他公序良俗に反する事

    上記の行為と管理者が判断した場合、サイレンスやアカウント停止などの措置に踏み切る可能性があります。あんまりそういうことはしたくないので、楽しく穏便に安全に遊んでください。何かあったら管理者に相談したりreportしたりしてください。基本的にはケンカダメゼッタイ！

    mastdonの仕様上”アカウントの削除”はできません。 アカウント停止は可能ですので管理者まで申し出てください。

    Email: gze.gzgzw@gmail.com

    Admin: @gze_gzgzw@gundam.masto.host

    hige.alterna-cloud.com (preview)

    | Users: 12 | Toots: 296 | Connections: 314 |

    ヒゲメガネ丼の由来は単に私がそのような見た目のためです汗

  • インフラエンジニア
  • マストドンインスタンス構築・運用
  • ガジェット好き
  • Apple好き
  • お酒好き(ウイスキー、シングルモルトが好きです)
  • 楽器やってる(私はドラムとギターを少々)
  • 写真やカメラに目がない

    そんなフレンズな方はゆるくアカウント登録してやって下さい。

    管理人もゆるくトゥート！してます。

    マストドン on GKEでのナレッジもある程度貯まったので、そんなインフラエンジニアな方も是非！！

    (more)このマストドンはGoogle Cloud Platformの以下のサービスを利用して運用しています。

    Google Container Engine Google Cloud SQL Google Cloud Storage Google Cloud DNS

    メール送信はSendGridを利用しています。

    mastodon.tetaneutral.net (preview)

    | Users: 571 | Toots: 11,666 | Connections: 956 |

    Ce serveur héberge une instance de Mastodon, réseau social de micro-blogging libre et décentralisé. Vous pouvez vous inscrire ici pour partager avec les autres membres, ainsi qu'avec les membres des autres instances.

    Bienvenue.

    Si le serveur n'accepte plus les nouveaux utilisateurs, essayez sur mstdn.fr.

    (more)Instance de Mastodon hébergée par l'association Tetaneutral.net à Toulouse, France. Son utilisation implique le respect de la législation française en vigueur. Les contenus illégaux seront retirés et en cas de récidive, le compte de leur auteur sera masqué, voire bloqué. Signalez les contenus illégaux via le menu déroulant attaché à chaque pouet Ces conditions sont en cours de définition au sein de l'association. Elles sont susceptibles d'évoluer.

    Email: mastodon-contact@tetaneutral.net

    Admin: @tetaneutral_net@mastodon.tetaneutral.net

    mimumedon.com (preview)

    | Users: 3,100 | Toots: 494,725 | Connections: 211 |

    Mimumedonはグラブルの話題を中心としたマストドンインスタンスです。

    グラブルが好きでマストドンで遊んでみたいという人が集まる場所となれば幸いです。

    ミムメモ速報の中の人がつくりました。

    お知らせ

    5月11日（木）画像等のファイル消去のお知らせ【完了】

    サーバー容量問題に対応するため、ストレージの移設を行いました。

    その際、既存の画像につきましては全て消去を行いました。

    お手数ですが、プロフィールアイコン等については再設定をお願いします

    アカウントについては引き続きそのままご利用いただけます。

    運営方針について

    「グラブルを遊んでる人が楽しく過ごせる場所」を目指してやっていきたいと考えています。

    ルール・注意事項

    公序良俗に反する投稿はおやめください

    BOTの類となる利用はおやめください

    他者への誹謗中傷、罵倒、暴言、差別的発言はおやめください

    お問い合わせ先

    ミムメモ速報:http://gran-matome.com/

    Mimumedon管理アカウントはこちら　→　@mimumemo

    Twitterアカウントははこちら → @guran_mimumemo

    masto.io (preview)

    | Users: 492 | Toots: 1,348 | Connections: 888 |

    Small alternative Mastodon instance with a short name. Registrations are open, but they may suspended/closed at any time if performance is compromised.

    (more) Contacts Fell free to contact me (through @sena@masto.io or sena@smux.net) for any instance related issue. Rules Here are the house rules:

    No harassing other people; No posting NSFW content or spoilers without using the Content Warning feature; No posting illegal content which can get you or me in trouble (this content will be removed if necessary, you may or may not be banned); Parody accounts are permitted (and encouraged!), but it’s suggested (not required) that such is stated in the bio.

    Just be a good human being™. Location and jurisdiction Currently, the infrastructure which supports this instance is hosted in the United States (Kansas City, Missouri), although there are medium term plans to migrate it to some European location. I am not based on the United States, so I may be more or less free from harassment from US law enforcement. Keep in mind that they should be able to shut the instance down and eavesdrop on communications and data without even warning me. Federation For transparency reasons,here’s a list of instances we don’t federate with:

    we currently don’t block any instance

    Donations If you want to help with hosting costs, feel free to donate through:

    Bitcoin: 1ESdVqpycpQoXjdzjnW7Q9GpVr2ehT9mCy; PayPal: paypal.me/jsribeiro.

    Email: sena@smux.net

    Admin: @sena@masto.io

    魔法少女まどか☆マギカファンのためのMastodonインスタンスです。まどマギ好きのみんなでまったりかつ和気藹々と語らいましょう。

    ルール

    以下のような行為はご遠慮ください。これらに違反した場合削除・アカウント停止等を行う場合がございます。

    • 法律に抵触する行為
    • 公序良俗に反する行為
    • 他者への誹謗中傷・糾弾行為
    • なりすまし
    • スパム等の連投行為
    • みだりにサーバに負担をかける行為（全ファボ・フォロ爆等）

    ルールを守って楽しくまどマギ！

    数式が書けるMastodon、その名もMathtodonです! (˃̵ᴗ˂̵ ζ) 数式は TeX, LaTeX 形式です。数学の情報発信や数学の議論など様々に楽しみましょう〜! // ありがたくも「donation はどうね? しょうん? donation だけに。わらわら」というお言葉をいただいています。 もちろんサーバ運営代などはかかっておりますが、今はそれよりも「数学が好きな人の集まる優しい世界」を構築することに、皆様の頭脳と貴重な時間とほんの少しずつ分けていただければそれが最高の donation だと思います。どうね? このコンセプト😄 // それでもなお donation をお考えという奇特な方は、 1AhmL4t7aqgQzs4ZG1PPcS2uY8Bz39DRQv か、あるいはAmazonの謎のリンクをご覧ください。

    (more)Bienvenue, Welcome on eunivers.social ! Vous êtes sur l'instance Mastodon de l'association eunivers. Nous sommes un groupe de passionnés du monde de l’électronique, des jeux vidéo, du esport et de bien d'autres passions. Site : eunivers.net | Patreon : eunivers Si vous avez un problème pour vous inscrire, contactez l'administrateur par mail. Règles : Les règles suivantes ne représente pas un document légal, et l'interprétation finale incombe à l'administration de eunivers.social; elles sont là pour vous donner un aperçu de nos politiques de modération:

    Ne floodez pas Respectez-vous les uns les autres Utilisez des étiquettes “NFSW” pour les contenus sensibles.

    mastodon.top (preview)

    | Users: 941 | Toots: 42,137 | Connections: 697 |

    Français :

    Mastodon.top est une instance mastodon hébergée en France par VirtuBox. Notre instance est mise à jour à chaque nouvelle release de mastodon. Visitez notre page à propos pour en savoir plus sur les règles de l'instance et notre politique de modération.

    English :

    Mastodon.top is an mastodon instance hosted in France by VirtuBox. Our instance is updated with each new release of mastodon. Visit our about page to learn more about the rules of the instance and our moderation policy.

    (more)Welcome on mastodon.top ! We are very happy to be a part of the mastodon project and we will do our best to keep this instance running up. The instance is updated with each new release of mastodon, and we perform a daily backup on a offsite storage. We support freedom of speech, and we will not block instances or users unless there is a good reason. We may silence users or instances to hide them in the public timeline, this way only followers will see their toots. Follow-us

    • Status@mastodon.top • Thomas @VirtuBox • VirtuBox

    Rules :

    • Don’t flood • Respect each other • Legal NSFW is allowed with Content Warning only • Use content warning for spoilers • Our servers are under French jurisdiction.

    What is under the hood ? :

    • 8 vCores XEON E5-1620v2

    • 8GB RAM DDR3 ECC

    • 100GB SSD + Backup storage

    Server status :

    The full monitoring dashboard is available here.

    mastodon.top is hosted by VirtuBox Install mastodon tutorial available on Anystack & Jesuisadmin

    Email: contact@virtubox.net

    Admin: @virtubox@mastodon.top

    basstdn.jp (preview)

    | Users: 156 | Toots: 642 | Connections: 17 |

    basstdn(バストドン)は、バス釣りのマストドンインスタンスです。

    バス釣りのことを自由にトゥート(発言)したり閲覧することができます。

    ルール

    • バス釣りが好き、興味があれば誰でも参加OK
    • 法律や公序良俗に反する行為はおやめください
    • ルールを守れない人はBANされる場合があります
    • みんながワクワクできるトゥートを心がけましょう

    お問い合わせ先

    Twitter：@basstdnjp



    ※注意※
    アカウント作成後の認証メールが、迷惑メールフォルダに振り分けられてしまう場合があります。 特に携帯メールアドレスは認証失敗の確率が高いようですので、ご注意ください。

    (more) Contact

    basstdn(バストドン)管理人bouz @bouz

    Business e-mail: [email protected]/ <![CDATA[ /!function(t,e,r,n,c,a,p){try{t=document.currentScript||function(){for(t=document.getElementsByTagName(‘script’),e=t.length;e–;)if(t[e].getAttribute(‘data-cfhash’))return t[e]}();if(t&&(c=t.previousSibling)){p=t.parentNode;if(a=c.getAttribute(‘data-cfemail’)){for(e=‘’,r=‘0x’+a.substr(0,2)|0,n=2;a.length-n;n+=2)e+=‘%’+(‘0’+(‘0x’+a.substr(n,2)r).toString(16)).slice(-2);p.replaceChild(document.createTextNode(decodeURIComponent(e)),c)}p.removeChild(t)}}catch(u){}}()/ ]]> /

    i.write.codethat.sucks (preview)

    | Users: 62 | Toots: 987 | Connections: 582 |

    I write code that sucks, if you do too this is the place for you!

    (more)Become a Patron!

    Site rules: Interaction with the community.

    Remember, people will never forget how you made them feel. Tag content that people may not want to see using the content warning function. Harassment and bullying of any kind will not be tolerated and will lead to a full suspension.

    Content

    Content illegal in the United Kingdom, France or the Netherlands is prohibited and will lead to a full suspension. Transphobic, homo/biphobic, racist, etc content is prohibited and will lead to a full suspension. Spam is prohibited. Bots are allowed but must not interact with users without being explicitly requested to.

    Network Please be aware that due to the nature of federated platforms, we have very little control over the behaviors of users from other communities.

    Use the standard mute and block functions where needed.

    However, please report users that offend the CoC of this instance and the administration will take action if necessary.

    Admin decisions are final and are not up for discussion. The rules set out above are guidelines for acceptable content/behavior and may be changed any time without notice.

    Please note the administration may take action in cases outside of the rules for the greater need of the community/federation at large.

    Suspended and silenced instances

    pawoo.net (Suspended) noagendasocial.com (Silenced)

    Email: kaylee@codethat.sucks

    Admin: @kaylee@i.write.codethat.sucks

    babuu.club (preview)

    | Users: 256 | Toots: 8,340 | Connections: 204 |

    【Babuuについて】

    Babuuは育児に関わる方々を対象としたMastodonのインスタンスです。 現在テスト運用中です。

    父母はもちろん、祖父祖母おじおば、教育、医療、福祉関係者etc…育児に関わる方ならだれでもOK!

    育児の合間の一息に、ママさんパパさん達のコミュニケーションに、ぜひご利用ください。

    (more)■最低限の利用ルール

    たとえそれがかわいい赤ちゃんでも、局部の写り込んだ写真の投稿はNGです。 R18の投稿はお控えください。判断が難しい場合は積極的にCWやNSFWを投稿時にに活用しましょう。 その他公序良俗に反する投稿は禁止します。

    ■お知らせについて

    Babuu内部向けアナウンスは以下のアカウントから行います。 Babuu(@Babuuclub)

    ■管理者とお問い合わせ先

    管理者は@itacchiku(2児の母)です。 問い合わせは、 Babuu(@itacchiku) Twitter(@itacchiku) までご連絡ください。

    ■ちょっとしたQ&A;

    ・登録メールが届かない 登録時の返送メールがとどかない場合、迷惑メールフォルダに振り分けられていることがよくあるようです。ご確認ください。 ・ログインしてみたら画面が真っ黒 マストドンは現在IE非対応となっています。IE以外のブラウザでログインするか、スマホアプリをご利用ください。 ・外部インスタンスとの接続について 一部のR18系をメインとしたインスタンスとの接続を除き、自由に開放しています。R18または差別的なトゥートの多いインスタンス及びアカウントがあれば、管理人までお知らせください。

    Email: babuu.club@gmail.com

    Admin: @Babuuclub@babuu.club

    dartsdon.jp (preview)

    | Users: 93 | Toots: 559 | Connections: 118 |

    ハードもソフトも日本のすべてのダーツプレイヤー、ダーツファンのためのMastodon=Dartsdonです。

    ダーツ関係者が管理をしているので、安心してご参加頂けます。

    ダーツ関係以外の方やダーツ関係でも管理人が怪しくて信用ならんと言う方は、他の有名サイト(ドワンゴさんやPixivさん運営）で登録される事をお勧めします。

    Dartsdonのアカウントはこちらで登録できます

    ※登録確認メールが届かない場合は、迷惑メールに分類されている可能性があります

    定常的な運営ができるかどうか未定ですので、最初はmastodonのお試しとしてご利用ください。
    ご利用の状況に応じて、今後サーバーリソース増強などの検討をいたします。

    当面は貧弱な体制での運用となるので、色々とご不便をおかけするかもしれませんが、ご了承の上ご利用ください。

    (more)ダーツに関する話題を中心にしたトゥートをお願いします。 エッチな画像、危ない画像、危ない文章は極力避けてくださいね。 どうしても上げたいときは、cwの設定で隠してください。

    ルールを守って楽しく遊びましょう。 お問い合わせはTwitter(@toshi_terada)またはFacebook(toshi.terada)までご連絡ください。

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @toshi_terada@dartsdon.jp

    glitch.social (preview)

    | Users: 54 | Toots: 9,474 | Connections: 640 |

    UNSTABLE BUT FRIENDLY

    BE WARNED this instance may actually be unstable at times. It will likely be used for experimenting with settings and tweaks to Mastodon. So the place may experience outages, not federate reliably with the rest of the world, have posts go missing, or other technical faults. As such it’s meant to be a chill, maybe kinda playful place. Time to see what we can do with this thing! Time to ˥∀IƆOS HƆ⊥I˥⅁

    This instance also has domain level blocks on numerous others, using the block list found here .

    followbots from other instances will be blocked. please report them

    Some rules

    • Do not engage in harassment of any kind.

    • Racist, sexist and other oppressive slurs will get you suspended, even in non-public conversations.

    • You can post porn and nudity, but you must use the nsfw flag and do not post on the public timeline or you will be silenced (ask around how to make unlisted posts)

    • try to be kind

    • no non-sentient bots until further notice

    • no shit that’s illegal in Canada

    • animated gifs should always be marked sensitive/NSFW and identified as animated gifs (for now let’s say just putting ‘gif’ in the text of the toot is sufficient), because they can cause serious problems for people

    some guidelines

    • stuff here is impermanent but i still want this to be as safe a space as we can reasonably make it. let’s keep common triggers and angry/ranty/grumpy toots behind CWs
    • free speech maximalists can kindly fuck off. there are instances where that is a priority. this is not one of them.

    • all languages are welcome!

    the privacy stuff in the ‘terms’ isn’t what it should be, but no time to change it yet. this instance’s data will not be sold or traded or whatever.

    (more) Contact

    beatrix bitrot @bea

    Business e-mail: haha@noooope.com

    Email: haha@noooope.com

    Admin: @bea@glitch.social

    mastodon.host (preview)

    | Users: 2,939 | Toots: 18,090 | Connections: 1,661 |

  • General, fast, stable and open instance.


  • Federate with everyone.


  • One of the most complete Federated timeline thanks to @federationbot

  • lightly moderated in general, common sense applied. That said, read the rules below :)


    • What sets mastodon.host appart ?

    As a general instance, we are not centered on a specific theme, or a specific language. Everyone is welcome as long as they follow the few rules we have.
    We have a very good view of the federation ( our federated timeline gives you a more broad view of the Mastodon network than a ‘normal’ instance, there’s a lot to read in a lot of languages ).
    Although we are a medium+ sized instance, we’d like to keep the feeling that you are at home and safe here. Never hesitate to contact the admin team if you have any questions !
    Please read the FAQ below or at https://mastodon.host/about/more to get started.

    What are the instance rules ?

    No illegal stuff, harassment, discrimination, xenophobia, threats or any behavior that is not appropriate to a friend will be tolerated to our users. This is a safe place for everyone, respect your fellow users or silence/block if you don’t want to see someone.
    We moderate on our users report

    Erotic/Porn/Gore/Etc.. talks/pictures/videos.. must be behind a CW. If you would not open that picture/video in front of your boss/wife/husband/kids => CW ( Content Warning ).
    Anything that is illegal in Europe/USA shall not be posted on this server, Lolicons for example are illegal. Globally common sense applied, don’t do illegal stuff, don’t discriminate, don’t be a racist, etc…
    Notify to an administrator or report if you have a doubt. Do not engage, if you don’t want to see someone’s contributions, you can block/silence that person and report to us, we’ll deal with it.
    We try to post in english so everyone understands, but that rule is not enforced at all ;)
    Most important have fun and be nice to each other !
    Oh and nazis, racists are banned on sight too, of course.

    What is this instance privacy policy ?

    We will never share your data with anyone, except if a valid legal request is received (Hopefully it will not happen).

    Who are the admins ? Shoutouts section.

    This instance is hosted by @gled

    (more)How does it works ? When you create an account on Mastodon, you create an account on the website you currently are visiting. For example, here you are on mastodon.host. That is your instance.

    You will notice after log in two different timelines, the Local and the Federated. The local timeline is all the public toots of all our local users ( the one who registered on mastodon.host and use it to access the Mastodon federation ). The federated timeline adds the public toots of all the users that our local users are following in other servers. That is here that mastodon.host is a bit different, with a bot that actively follow everyone it sees on the federated timeline, we’ll have eventually a good view of the overall network on the federated timeline.

    @federationbot code is available on Github

    What app can I use on my phone ? There’s multiples apps that support Mastodon: - Twidere now support both Twitter and Mastodon, allowing you to seamlessly using the two networks, available for both Android and iOS. - Amaroq is a popular app for Iphones. - Tooty Fruity, Tusky, 11t or Subway tooter are also an option for Android phones. How do I get verified ? Who is who ? Do it yourself ;) For now there is no verification on Mastodon, it’s just an emoji that people add as a joke.Your identity on Mastodon and the fediverse ( the federation of all the Mastodon instances ) is yourusername@yourinstance, so when you register here, your identity is yourusername@mastodon.host . You can follow and communicate with anyone in the fediverse if you know his username@instance ! How do I follow a user from another instance ? If you know his username and his instance, you can search for @username@instance and from there it should be pretty easy. It’s pretty young so there’s room for improvments, and I’m sure that we’ll end up being able to search across instances. There is now also some sites that allows searching users. You can always look at the federated timeline and find some interesting contacts ! How do I mask X language from the timelines ? I can’t read that That’s a feature being developped at the moment, but you can always head to Mastodon lang remover to do it in your browser without waiting for the feature to be integrated. Who is moderating the instance ? For the moment, you by reporting the posts and users and the admin enforcing the rules. We are currently recruiting a moderator team ( look for the announces by @gled ). How often do you update the service ? Usually the day a new stable version is released. You can follow @gled for announces when this is happening. How much does it cost ? Mastodon is free for the users. This instance is hosted by me,@gled, on my personal funds. Your help is appreciated to maintain/make the platform evolve. How can I help ? You can get involved in multiple ways, you can welcome new users, animate the local timeline, promote our instance and invite new users here, report posts and users not respecting our rules…

    You can also help with the costs of running the service by donating, any small amount is appreciated ! Donations are accepted on:  Liberapay:    Paypal:

    What if the administrator cannot keep the service running ? If in the future, we are unable to continue maintaining the service, it’ll be handed to another administrator team that the community trusts !

    Email: gled@remote-shell.net

    Admin: @gled@mastodon.host

    s.meo.ws (preview)

    | Users: 17 | Toots: 1,347 | Connections: 533 |

    s.meo.ws is an experimental Mastodon cluster managed by FuslVZ.

    Policies:
    • Any content/site/service/action illegal in Austria, England, Ukraine or United States
    • DMCA takedown requests are checked and content is removed if we think it violates the policies
    • Spamming and mass user following is strictly forbidden and will result in removal of your account
    • Pornographic content is allowed - Pornographic content picturing minors (under 18) is obviously not allowed, this includes soft pornography and nudity as well
    SLA, uptime, service info and support:
    • We run the systems based on a best-effort policy. We do not offer SLA or uptime guarantee.
    • Although we try our best, we can not guarantee that this service can be provided forever.
    • Support (if any at all) is also based on a best-effort policy - Please contact @fusl@s.meo.ws if you have any questions or support inquiries.
    This basically means that no SLA is included so if you would like to sign up, do it at your own risk.

    (more) Contact

    Fusl @fusl

    Business e-mail: fusl@meo.ws

    Email: fusl@meo.ws

    Admin: @fusl@s.meo.ws

    social.tchncs.de (preview)

    | Users: 7,248 | Toots: 76,747 | Connections: 1,383 |

    This might be one of the best pieces of software for microblogging you can get right now. We here at tchncs.de are proud to be one of the first instances of Mastodon! Quick updates ensured. Mastodon is compatible and connected to the GNUsocial network.

    (more)

    Above statistics are specific to this server. Guidelines On social.tchncs.de our primary directive is: → “Be nice to each other!” Please remember there are real people on the other side of the screen, and those people may have different feelings and opinions and experiences than you do. Some of them may be tired or having a bad day. Or you might. You don’t have to agree with someone to be civil to them. If you can’t be civil to someone, leave them alone. If you don’t wish to interact with someone, or see any of their posts, there are tools at your disposal including mute and block functions. If someone’s posts make you angry or upset, take some time to calm down before you reply. You might also try simply excusing yourself from a conversation and ask them to untag you if you no longer wish to discuss a topic. When someone asks you to leave them alone, leave them alone. If you feel like you can’t control your urge to respond to that person, use the block or mute feature so you won’t see their posts and be tempted. Keep in mind that while you cannot control other people’s behavior, you are still responsible for your own conduct, even if you feel someone was rude to you or someone else. We will not allow abusive or disruptive conduct by or toward users on social.tchncs.de. This includes continuing to engage in conversation with someone who has specifically requested you leave them alone, inciting other users to engage with that person on your behalf, aggregating and posting another person’s personal information without their consent, and inciting others to engage with that person on other platforms. Blocking someone and then sitting on the other side of a block and continuing to talk about that person is also a provoking behavior. Before you post, think about whether this is the kind of thing you would like to see (or would like your mom or kids to see) in the public timeline. There are post visibility settings that give you some control over which timelines your post appears in, and also CW and NSFW buttons to hide specific text and images in your post. Be a good social media neighbor and use these functions when appropriate.

    Content not allowed on social.tchncs.de

    Sexual depictions of children Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Content which will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    We will also remove any content we judge to be hateful toward specific individuals or groups, or intended to cause or incite harm from the public timeline.

    This guideline is intentionally vague because we do not intend to play “rules lawyer” on the subject of what it is and isn’t okay to say about people. A good rule of thumb is, if you’re about to say something you think might fall foul of this rule, you probably shouldn’t say it. ☺

    Email: tchncs@vivaldi.net

    Admin: @milan@social.tchncs.de
