        twingyeo.kr (preview)

        | Users: 73 | Toots: 1,288 | Connections: 444 |

        Twingyeo (트잉여)는 한국어 사용자를 위한 Mastodon 인스턴스입니다.

        (more)인스턴스 규칙 및 기타 공지 사항 2017/04/26 16:31 갱신 규칙

        이 인스턴스에서는 다음과 같은 행위를 금지하고 있으며 규칙을 위반할 시 예고 없이 계정이 정지될 수도 있습니다. ※ 여기서 컨텐츠는 사용자가 이 인스턴스에 업로드한 Toot나 미디어를 칭합니다.

        성적・잔혹 등의 다른 사용자가 불쾌함을 느낄 수 있는 과격한 내용의 컨텐츠를 NSFW 표시 없이 Public Timeline에 투고하는 행위 다른 사용자를 모욕하거나 괴롭힘, 사칭, 명예 훼손의 목적으로 계정을 생성하거나 컨텐츠를 투고하는 행위 (사이버 불링・리벤지 포르노…) 스크립트 등의 자동화된 수단을 사용하여 계정을 다중 생성하거나 광고를 투고하는 행위

        관리자 목록 현재 관리자 목록은 다음과 같습니다.

        @cheesekun

        관리자가 지켜야 할 규칙

        모든 관리 사항은 최대한 투명하게 이루어져야 합니다. 신념, 입장의 차이, 개인적인 원한과 같은 이유로 사용자의 계정을 함부로 정지하지 않아야 합니다.

        기타

        이 인스턴스는 100% 자비로 운영되고 있지만 현재 후원은 받지 않습니다. Twitter @twingyeo_kr 를 팔로우 하셔서 이 인스턴스와 관련된 소식을 받아 보세요!

        Email: doping.cheese@gmail.com

        Admin: @cheesekun@twingyeo.kr

        freeradical.zone (preview)

        | Users: 75 | Toots: 2,916 | Connections: 771 |

        Free Radical is our social media haven. It’s where we talk in an inviting, respectful setting where we can set our own boundaries. We’d love for you to join us!

        Read about our adventures on the Free Radical Blog.

        (more)Code of Conduct Prior art

        Mastodon.social guidelines JSConf Code of Conduct Toot Café guidelines

        The short version

        Don’t harass anyone If someone is harassing you, report it to a moderator Have fun Be excellent to each other

        Moderators

        @tek

        Blocked instances We block some other instances. The full list is on GitHub. Contact a moderator if you wish to dispute an entry. Rules

        No advertising or excessive promotion No bots, unless they’re cute, funny, or useful. Bots should avoid posting to the public timeline. No gore or graphic violence Content that is borderline NSFW or could be construed as NSFW at a glance should be put behind a CW (Content Warning) No racism No sexism No discrimination based on gender, sexual minority, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, religion (or lack thereof), or national origin No xenophobia or violent nationalism No sexual depictions of children No holocaust denialism, Nazi symbolism, promotion of National Socialism, or anything that is illegal in the European Union No stalking or harassment No fake accounts unless they are clearly labeled as such

        Handling harassment If you are being harassed, please report the user using the “…” button and then “Report.” For urgent concerns, please DM a moderator. If you engage in harassing behavior, the moderator may take any action they deem appropriate, such as a warning or an expulsion. The above rules may change at any time, and you may be banned at any time based on the moderators’ judgment. Privacy policy What will we do with your data? Nothing. How will you be influenced by advertisers? You won’t; brands and non-humans (other than fun/useful bots) are banned. How will we aggregate your data in order to improve your service… none of that. We will never share your data with anyone else, except in the case of valid legal requests if it comes to that. (Hopefully it won’t come to that!) Understand though that this instance is run by me and my friends, and (as is the case with all Mastodon servers) we potentially have access to your data, including DMs. The back-end is also not encrypted. If this is not okay with you, this might not be the instance for you. Also, for truly private data sent between two people, Mastodon offers no E2E encryption. So use Signal or WhatsApp for the things you really want to be private. More privacy measures on Free Radical:

        Our robots.txt file asks crawlers not to explore the site. HTTPS is used everywhere thanks to Let’s Encrypt. No ads or trackers. Links are direct URLs rather than tracking redirects.

        Discussion and feedback For questions about policy, bots, design, theming, etc., please open an issue. About this server Free Radical is a Digital Ocean droplet in San Francisco. It’s maintained by Kirk Strauser. Thanks for visiting!

        Email: tek@freeradical.zone

        Admin: @tek@freeradical.zone

        mammut.red (preview)

        | Users: 145 | Toots: 1,288 | Connections: 455 |

        Mammut.redについて

        日本のインスタンスです。 内容は特に制限はしていませんが、IT系の話題が多くなるかと思います。

        ルール

        • 日本の法律は厳守して下さい
        • 意図的にサーバーに負荷を掛けるような行為はしないで下さい(バルス等の呪文は手動詠唱である場合に限り、他のインスタンスに迷惑を掛けない範囲で使用して構いません)

        (more) 連絡先

        Tatsuki✅ @Tatsuki

        ビジネスメールアドレス: support@mammut.red

        Email: support@mammut.red

        Admin: @Tatsuki@mammut.red

        mastodon.cx (preview)

        | Users: 3,150 | Toots: 28,129 | Connections: 852 |

        👉 Alternative Mastodon instance hosted in France by Netrix.

        (more)🇫🇷 Bonjour à tous ! 🌎 (English version below) 👔 Owner : @jordan — 👀 Admins : @andre & @Peter

        Afficher la liste des comptes d'organisations ou de marques vérifiés Cacher la liste des comptes d'organisations ou de marques vérifiés

        @Visov1 @Hardisk

        Vous êtes une organisation, ou vous possédez une marque déposée et vous souhaitez être vérifiés ? Contactez @andre

        Bienvenue sur cette instance (majoritairement) Française de Mastodon. Une question ? Nous sommes là pour vous répondre, publiez simplement en « local » ou à @support@mastodon.cx et nous vous aiderons. — 🚫 Merci de ne pas publier du contenu :

        Publicitaire (excessif) Spam (non-désiré) Extrêmement Violent (images gores, etc) Raciste, sexiste, xénophobe, discriminant.. Incitant à la haine Nazisme, extrémisme, propagande

        — ⚠️ Sont autorisés sous « Content Warning » :

        Le contenu sexuellement explicite (NSFW) Les images pouvant heurter la sensibilité des plus jeunes

        Tout harcèlement sera sanctionné. Les administrateurs se réservent le droit de supprimer les publications ne respectant pas les règles présentes sur cette page. En cas de manquement grave ou multiple, l’utilisateur se verra malheureusement banni. En cas de publication ne respectant pas les lois en vigueurs concernant la propriété intellectuelle, nous serons dans l’obligation de la supprimer.

        Hello ! Welcome to this instance (mainly French) of Mastodon. Questions ? We are here to help you ! Just ask on local timeline or @support@mastodon.cx and we’ll help you.

        The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

        Excessive advertising Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

        The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

        Racism or advocation of racism Sexism or advocation of sexism Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

        The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

        Sexual depictions of children Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

        Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

        Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person’s demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

        These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user’s access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

        Email: jordan@mastodon.cx

        Admin: @jordan@mastodon.cx

        Dernière mise à jour : 06/05/17 - V. 1.3.3

        (more)Bienvenue sur spacejerk.fr ! Je suis citizenz7 (aka mumbly), l'admin de spacejerk.fr, un nivernais passionné par les logiciels libres et le Net. Voici mon blog : citizenz.info. Vous pourrez y retrouver plusieurs tutos, etc., notamment sur Mastodon. Je suis également le webmaster de freetorrent.fr : tracker bittorrent exclusivement réservé aux médias sous licence libre ou licence de libre diffusion. Si vous avez un problème sur spacejerk.fr, envoyez-moi un e-mail.

        Voici les caractéristiques du serveur de spacejerk.fr : Cette instance est hébergée sur un VPS Pulseheberg, en France (VPS-8 à 8 €/mois).         mastodon.xxx (preview)

        | Users: 17 | Toots: 119 | Connections: 204 |

        自由な表現を追求するインスタンスです。

        長期的・安定的な運用を目指しています。バックアップは毎日作成しています。

        利用者のIPアドレスなどの開示請求には裁判所命令または令状が必要です。

        (more)発信者情報開示の方針

        利用者のIPアドレス等の開示請求は請求者の属性（個人、法人、公的機関等）に関わらず、令状や裁判所命令などがある場合にのみ応じます。任意の協力要請については特別の緊急性（自殺の予告など）がある場合のみ応じます。

        禁止事項

        日本国法に抵触する行為 機械的な大量フォロー（いわゆる「フォロ爆」） 機械的な大量投稿 スパム その他の迷惑行為

        Email: contact@mastodon.xxx

        Admin: @xxx@mastodon.xxx

        sakaba.space (preview)

        | Users: 74 | Toots: 1,568 | Connections: 9 |

        よく来たな。ここはマストドン酒場だ。あんたも冒険者なんだろう？見れば分かる。
        北の山にモンスターが住み着いてからというもの、ここに来るのはあんたみたいな連中ばかりさ。
        ゆっくりしていくといい。各地方から色んな奴らが集まってるから、何かいい情報が聞き出せるかもしれないぜ。


        一応ここのルールみたいなもんだ

        • 酒場での話題には決まり事なんかない。好きに話せば誰かが聞いててくれるだろう。
        • もしモンスターを見かけたら、リプライ（返信）ってやつで何発か攻撃すれば倒せるはずだ。
        • 亡霊や機械人形(bot)でも構わないが、酒場に迷惑をかけるやつは容赦なく叩き出す(BAN)からな。
        • あまり大きな店じゃないんで、もしかしたら満席（募集停止）になるときが来るかもしれないが勘弁してくれ。

        (more)更新履歴

        2017.5.8: BOSS召喚コマンドを実装しました 2017.4.29: ゾンビを実装しました 2017.4.28: 壊れかけた時計を実装しました

        お問い合わせ

        開発者Mastodon @midori44 開発者Twitter @midori44

        Email: Not Available

        Admin: @master@sakaba.space

        lovelive-anime.tk (preview)

        | Users: 297 | Toots: 3,029 | Connections: 259 |

        ラブライブ！のファンコミュニティです。
        μ'sic Forever!

        登録確認メールについて

        登録確認メールが届かない場合、迷惑メールフォルダに入っていることがあります。
        5分経過して届かない場合は、お手数ですが一度ご確認ください。
        それでも登録できない場合、下記のお問い合わせからご連絡いただければ手動で対応致します。

        投稿の注意事項

        犯罪予告や他者の権利を侵害する投稿などは受け付けておりません。
        これらの投稿は予告なく削除及び投稿者アカウントの停止等の措置を行う場合があります。

        R-15を超えるような画像はアップロード後「NSFW」ボタンを押すことでタイムライン上での表示にワンクッション置くことが出来ます。（いわゆる閲覧注意）※強く推奨します

        以上のルールは当インスタンス独自のものです。他インスタンスを利用される場合はそのインスタンスのルールに従ってください。

        お問い合わせ

        Mastodon内 : @niru_live
        またはメール : notifications@lovelive-anime.tk

        (more)お問い合わせは「notifications@lovelive-anime.tk」へ。

        Email: notifications@lovelive-anime.tk

        Admin: @niru_live@lovelive-anime.tk

        mastodon.yuu26.com (preview)

        | Users: 25 | Toots: 61 | Connections: 338 |

        趣味で建ててみたmastodonサーバです。マストドンを試してみたい方や実験してみたい方など、ぜひぜひ使ってみてください。

        HTTP2対応ドメインはこちら https://mastodon.freetls.fastly.net

        実験で得られた知見:
        Dockerで立ち上げたMastodonのDBを後から永続化する
        Mastodonで他インスタンスの情報が正常に表示されない場合の対処

        (more)サーバスペックなど Google Cloud Platform 東京リージョン OS: CentOS 7.3 CPU: Intel® Xeon® CPU @ 2.20GHz (仮想1コア) RAM: 3.75GB DNS: AWS Route 53 Monitor: Zabbix on GCP Other: Docker, nginx, Let’s Encrypt

        サーバ（～2017/04/30） Microsoft Azure 東日本リージョン OS: CentOS 7.3 CPU: Intel® Xeon® CPU E5-2673 v3 (仮想2コア) RAM: 4GB Storage: Azure Premium Storage (SSD)

        注意事項 なりすまし等の迷惑行為や、法律に触れるような行為は控えてください。

        履歴 2017/05/15 Fastly対応ドメイン を追加 2017/05/01 v1.3.2 アップデート 2017/04/30 Azure→GCPに引っ越し 2017/04/24 TLが流れない不具合解消 2017/04/24 v1.2.2 アップデート 2017/04/18 v1.2 アップデート 2017/04/15 公開

        作った人 @yuu26 寿司が好きなエンジニア　Mastodon　Twitter

        Email: Not Available

        Admin: @yuu26@mastodon.yuu26.com

        ohai.su (preview)

        | Users: 50 | Toots: 855 | Connections: 669 |

        ohai.su

        (more)Code of Conduct As tooters on this instance, we pledge to uphold an environment that is radically inclusive with respect for all users of the instance. We are committed to making participation in this instance an oppression-free experience for everyone, regardless of level of experience, gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, or nationality. We define oppression as any language or action that expresses, reinforces, upholds or sympathizes with any form of systemic social domination. Examples of unacceptable behavior by participants include: The use of sexualized / violent language or imagery at non-consenting parties, on the public timeline, or without the nsfw filter Personal attacks Trolling or insulting/derogatory comments Public or private oppressive language or actions Other unethical conduct Users are empowered and responsible for addressing any abuses of the Code of Conduct such that the project remains an oppression-free experience. By adopting this Code of Conduct, users commit themselves to fairly and consistently applying these principles to every aspect of using this instance. users who do not follow or enforce the Code of Conduct may be permanently banned. This Code of Conduct applies both to toots on ohai.su and to public spaces when an individual is representing ohai.su or its community. Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be reported by contacting an admin by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and investigated and will result in a response that is deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances. Admins are obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

        Email: lukas@fnordserver.eu

        Admin: @lutoma@ohai.su

        mstdn.uec.tokyo (preview)

        | Users: 121 | Toots: 1,550 | Connections: 373 |

        mstdn.uec.tokyoはUEC TOKYOが提供するMastodonサーバです。

        とりあえず公開します。特に参加制限は設けていないので、どなたでも自由にどうぞ。

        本インスタンスに関するご連絡はwhywaitaまで。

        Hotmail系メールアドレスについて

        本インスタンスが利用しているメールサーバ(Mailgun)とHotmail系のメールサーバとの相性が悪いらしく、メールが届かないことがあります。
        もし半日程度待って届かないなどありましたら、ご連絡ください。対応します。

        ルール

        日本法は守ってください。

        (more)mstdn.uec.tokyoは whywrite.it によって運営されています。

        Email: whywaita@whywrite.it

        Admin: @whywaita@mstdn.uec.tokyo

        iamastodon.gifu.jp (preview)

        | Users: 64 | Toots: 587 | Connections: 118 |

        Mastodon in IAMAS -> IAMASTODON


        Iamasに関連するひとたちのためのMastodonです。

        注意点


        ・分散型といってもSNSの一つであるので、ネットの海に上がるということを意識して使いましょう。法律は守りましょう。

        ・大事なやりとりは、もっとちゃんとしたところでやりましょう。ここはやはりチラシの裏程度の存在です。

        ・個人のサーバで運営しているので、情報保持や運営・動作についての保証はできません。認証のパスワードは普段使っていないものにしてください。

        ・たまに止まります。ご注意ください。


        お問い合わせ先

        お問い合わせは，メール(akihiro-kato.16(at)iamas.ac.jp)もしくはTwitter(@croe_c)にお願いします．


        寄付について

        よろしくおねがいします。。

        Bitcoin: 3PjFuX5HdAQeeUnWaqxgXe3riYv9ZNzbMr

        Amazon ウィッシュリスト

        cosp.la (preview)

        | Users: 24 | Toots: 6 | Connections: 7 |

        Mastodonコスプレ鯖です。

        • コスプレに特化したサーバです。
        • コスプレ写真のアップ、併せの募集、温めておいた夢小説、 撮影/レタッチテクニックの共有等に利用してください。

        ルール

        • 不適切な投稿、サーバに負荷をかける行為、SPAM投稿は禁止します。日本法に抵触するような投稿も禁止します。投稿内容によっては警察、裁判所からの発信者情報開示請求に応じ、IPアドレスその他情報の提供を実施します。
        • エログロになりそうなトゥートにはContent Warningを、画像にはNSFWタグを付けてください。例え付けていても日本法に抵触するような画像はトゥートしないでください。
        • お行儀よくしてください。

        Bot作成について

        • 基本的に禁止します。

        お問い合わせ先

        • お問合わせは @getubella にお願いします。

        (more) 連絡先

        ひろりん @getubella

        ビジネスメールアドレス: admin@cosp.la

        Email: admin@cosp.la

        Admin: @getubella@cosp.la

        taruntarun.net (preview)

        | Users: 15 | Toots: 1,068 | Connections: 444 |

        たるんたるん！
        まだ試運転中です。
        安定稼働を目指しますが、不定期の再起動を行う場合があります。

        注意

        • パスワードの使い回しは絶対にしないでください。
            一通りのセキュリティ対策は施していますが安全に絶対はありません。
        • スマホ・ケータイメールアドレスを登録に用いる場合、
          mastodon-notice_at_taruntarun.net ( at を＠に置換 )
          からのメールを受信できるようにしてから登録を行ってください。
        • エロ・グロなどの理由で 18 禁になりそうな文章には Content Warning 、同画像には NSFW タグを付けてください。
          守られていない場合、アカウント削除などの対処をする場合があります。
        • 1 秒間に何回もフォロー・ふぁぼ・ブースト等を行うような、サーバーに過度の負荷をかける行為はお避けください。
        • 情報収集などを行うような自動処理による利用は原則禁止です。
          見つけ次第アカウント削除などの対処をする場合があります。

        禁止行為

        • 公序良俗に反する行為
        • 日本国内の法律に違反する行為
        • 犯罪をほのめかす行為
        • 出会い系などの宣伝行為
        • 他者を中傷・損害を与える行為
        • 実在の人物・団体など他者になりすます行為
        • 他者の著作物を無断転載する行為
        • サーバーに過度の負荷をかける行為


        何かあれば Mastodon: @mayaeh または Twitter: @mayaeh までご連絡ください。

        (more) 登録に使用したメールアドレス・パスワード (機密情報という) は特段の事情がない限り管理者も閲覧することはいたしません。 また機密情報は警察等からの要請がない限り他人に渡すことはいたしません。 また機密情報は当サイト運営のためだけに使用し、他の用途に転用することはいたしません。 ただし利用者に連絡を取る必要があり、他の連絡手段がない場合に限り該当者のメールアドレスを閲覧し、連絡を試みる場合があります。

        Email: mail@taruntarun.net

        Admin: @mayaeh@taruntarun.net

        mastodon.gougere.fr (preview)

        | Users: 1,162 | Toots: 22,117 | Connections: 910 |

        Vive les gougères ! mnt-by: @yapret @papaeng89

        (more)Gougère ? Vous vous trouvez sur l'instance Mastodon de Gougère, un réseau informatique géré sur notre temps libre. L'instance est maintenue par @papaeng89 et @yapret. Le serveur se trouve dans le datacenter Auxerrois de Virtua Networks, et utilise la bande passante de SCANI. Quelques règles De manière générale, les utilisateurs de cette instance sont invités à respecter la Netiquette (telle que décrite dans la RFC 1855). Les contenus NSFW sont autorisés seulement s'ils sont taggés comme tels et légaux en France, de même que les spoilers pouettés doivent l'être sous Content Warning explicite. Il est souhaitable que chacun tente, dans la mesure du possible, de ne pas flooder, notamment sur les timelines publiques. La liberté des uns s'arrête là où commence celle des autres. Si quelqu'un empiète sur la vôtre, vous pouvez le bloquer et/ou le signaler aux administrateurs, qui se chargeront, avec l'avis de la communauté, de prendre les mesures nécessaires. Nous aider L'accès à l'instance est gratuit et le restera, mais le réseau Gougère a un coût. Pour nous aider à le supporter, c'est par là : https://www.patreon.com/yapret

        Email: Not Available

        Admin: @gougerenet@mastodon.gougere.fr

        babymetal.party (preview)

        | Users: 108 | Toots: 767 | Connections: 328 |

        BABYMETALファンが集まるMastodonのインスタンスです。

        This is the Mastodon Instance for BABYMETAL fans.

        Put your Kitsune up!

        Since April 26 2017

        ルール

        • 日本の法律に反する行為は禁止です
        • 他者の権利の侵害になる行為は禁止です
        • CD、DVD、Blu-ray等からコピーした音声や映像をTOOTしないでください
        • BABYMETALのメンバーや関係者等のなりすましは禁止です
        • 写真やイラストを投稿する時は可能な限り出典を記して下さい
          ※イラストの場合は必ず作者を明記して下さい。
        • We are THE ONE!

        Rules

        • Acts contrary to Japanese law are prohibited.
        • Acts that infringe the rights of others are forbidden.
        • Please do not post audio and video copied from CD, DVD, Blu-ray etc.
        • When you post photos and illustrations, please write down the source as much as possible.
          *In the case of illustrations, please be sure to state the author of it.
        • We are THE ONE!

        管理者について

        BABYMETALファンの@mammaが運営しています。
        Twitter Facebook Google+ BLOG

        About administrator

        This instance is operated by @mamma.
        Twitter Facebook Google+ BLOG

        (more) Contact

        mamma (admin) @mamma

        Business e-mail:

        Email: Not Available

        Admin: @mamma@babymetal.party

        mstdn.io (preview)

        | Users: 4,003 | Toots: 41,077 | Connections: 1,516 |

        Fast and up-to-date instance, welcoming everyone around the world. Come join us!

        Up since 04/04/2017.

        (more)Welcome on mstdn.io! I’m @angristan, the admin, a french tech enthusiast and learning sysadmin. I run my french blog here : angristan.fr This instance is IPv6 compatible, has good HTTPS parameters, is following good security practices, has good uptime is focused on speed and will be updated regularly. Also, I try to be as transparent as possible. If you have trouble with the instance, please send my an email or contact me on Twitter : @fuolpit

        By @headlessideas (also made the favicon) Rules : • Don’t flood • Respect each other • I (the admin) support freedom of speech, so I won’t block accounts or instances unless there is a good reason (like a legal one) • Use NSFW tags for NSFW content 🔞 • Use content warning for spoilers • Any language is allowed 🌎 • Have fun 🎉 Feel free to block or mute whoever you want. What’s behind ? This instance is hosted on a VPS at NiHost, in France. They provide a very good quality of service, and accepted to make a custom VPS for the needs of this instance. Thanks to them! The VPS has the following specifications : • 8 virtual cores of Intel Xeon E5-2650v3 • 16 GB of DDR4 RAM • 100 GB of SSD in RAID 5 • 1 Gb/s unlimited bandwidth • Debian 8 This server is backed up everyday on another one. Here are some statistics. You can check all the graphs here.

        Check out the live monitoring! Donations You can donate to help me maintain this instance in the long term. Here is what I have to pay : • Domaine name: 35€/year • Server: 16€/month (thanks to my partnership with NiHost) • Backup server: 10€/month I also run 4 Tor relays, so your money will alway be put to good use 😊 I also invested a lot of time for this, dozens of hours of installing, tweaking, debugging, optimizing, monitoring, explaining, etc. I love it, it’s my passion, but I do this on my free time, so any thanks for my work, financial or not, is really appreciated. Don’t forget to toot me @angristan if you made a donation. 😉 • Paypal They restricted my account because I’m not 18. Fuck them ! Cryptocurrencies don’t ask for my age at least. • Patreon • BTC : 16Q9j1stgzwuiosVfAuTaCGJWDhTr4SEjf • ETH : 0xe673F66AEA00D0b7b8D968e837022E84B9d2534C • LTC : LSVQpJD3Vh3tMLkk3tZhSTPrjGHu6PkxZQ Don’t forget to donate to the main dev, he is the one making the hard work for Mastodon : Gargron’s Patreon If you can’t help financially, don’t worry ! Just talk about Mastodon around you, help the new users, and toot every day ! Thank you, and happy tooting!

        We’re no strangers to tweets You know the rules, and so do I The full federation that I’m thinking of You wouldn’t get it from Any other instance I’m just gonna tell you how I toot Gonna make you understand Never gonna toot you up Never gonna boost you down Never gonna tweet around and Subtoot you Never gonna make you toot Never gonna say good toot Never gonna tell a toot And toot you

        Email: angristan@protonmail.com

        Admin: @angristan@mstdn.io

        mastodon.technology (preview)

        | Users: 3,874 | Toots: 39,787 | Connections: 1,333 |

        This Mastodon instance is for people interested in technology. Discussions aren’t limited to technology, because tech folks shouldn’t be limited to technology either!

        Don’t be a jerk to anyone or we’ll need to be a jerk to you. We adhere to the TootCat Code of Conduct and follow the Toot Café list of blocked instances.

        (more)Code of Conduct As tooters on this instance, we pledge to uphold an environment that is radically inclusive with respect for all users of the instance. We are committed to making participation in this instance an oppression-free experience for everyone, regardless of level of experience, gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, or nationality. We define oppression as any language or action that expresses, reinforces, upholds or sympathizes with any form of systemic social domination. Examples of unacceptable behavior by participants include:

        Personal attacks Trolling or insulting/derogatory comments Public or private oppressive language or actions Other unethical conduct Users are empowered and responsible for addressing any abuses of the Code of Conduct such that the project remains an oppression-free experience.

        Certain types of content should posted in such a way that you avoid showing it to non-consenting parties. These types of content should:

        Not be used a profile picture Be posted with a “NSFW” tag Not be posted to the public timeline

        the above rules apply to content that is:

        Sexualized Violent Flashing or rapidly changing

        By adopting this Code of Conduct, users commit themselves to fairly and consistently applying these principles to every aspect of using this instance. users who do not follow or enforce the Code of Conduct may be permanently banned. This Code of Conduct applies both to toots on toot.cat and to public spaces when an individual is representing toot.cat or its community. Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be reported by contacting an admin by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and investigated and will result in a response that is deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances. Admins are obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

        Email: ash@ashfurrow.com

        Admin: @ashfurrow@mastodon.technology

        ・本インスタンスは日本のSecond Life(セカンドライフ)をテーマとしたインスタンスとなります。

        ・サイトの運営上やむを得ない場合サイト内のデータを消去する場合があります。

        ・サイトの負荷上、予告なく登録を停止・休止する場合があります。

        ・エロ/グロやSPAM、過度の連投や，自動大量フォロー、個人情報の書き込みの他、法に抵触する可能性のある投稿があった場合には、管理人の判断で予告なく消去する場合、アカウントの停止を行う場合があります。

        pouet.it (preview)

        | Users: 191 | Toots: 8,063 | Connections: 844 |

        Instance anarchostalinienne et allié·e·s membre de la fédération OStatus (GNU social, Mastodon).

        Tout enfant abandonné sera détruit.

        (more)Un spectre hante l’Internet Ce réseau fait partie d’une fédération de sites utilisant le logiciel Mastodon et communicant entre eux. On y agit telle une communauté politique, ayant le souci du débat, de la solidarité, et de s’extraire des services centralisés capitalistes. Plan quinquennal On utilise l’orthographe inclusive, et c’est mieux si c'est avec un point médian (·). On apprécie aussi la correction typographique, mais on ne te le fera pas remarquer (la langue est un outil de domination). Politburo Ne seront pas toléré·e·s :

        Les menaces Le harcèlement Le sexisme Le racisme

        Commissariat du peuple aux Finances Ce serveur me coûte 4,83 € par mois. Aidez-moi à soutenir la dépense pour garder un fonctionnement optimal. Serveur :

        Scaleway BareMetal C1 3,62 € par mois TVAC

        Nom de domaine :

        Gandi 14,52 € par an TVAC

        Coût :

        Annuel : 57,96 € Mensuel : 4,83 €

        ieji.de (preview)

        | Users: 17 | Toots: 79 | Connections: 270 |

        SECURE multiple A+ TLS ratings (TLS OBS QUA HTB)
        STABLE financially backed, won’t go down in a week like some do
        POWERFUL Intel Xeon E5-1650v3, DDR4-2133 RAM, WD SE HDDs RAID10 (high traffic configs)
        LIBERAL based in Germany, Frankfurt and uses 1984.is DNS and LE Certs
        IPv6 SUPPORT via tunnelbroker.net
        NO LOGS nginx saves no logs, don’t know about the mastodon ruby stuff though. Disregard the privacy policy, it’s the default one
        USE VIA TOR NETWORK AT iejidevtqqdlukju.onion for extra anonymity (you have to accept an invalid https certificate though, as Let’s Encrypt disallows .onion certification)
        KNOW YOUR HOST german legit Impressum (imprint) with many ways to contact

        (more)Code of Conduct: ieji.de is availabe via Tor. That doesn’t make this instance free of rules.

        Do NOT: - harass people in any way, constructive and founded critisism is ok - spam at others, especially on other instances - spread explicit pictures of minors - spread copyrighted material - break german law (no nazis or extremists allowed)

        Depending on the rules broken I may have to report you to german authorities as precise as I can or give you at max two warning before blocking you out.

        I’ll do my best to respond to reports asap. Abuse of the report option will get you banned after the third misbehaviour.

        If you are an instance admin and run into a problem, be it technical or an abusive user, please reach out to me. Via mastodon account or mail displayed in the contact box.

        Basicly, act accordingly to german freedom of speech rules or prepare to get warned/banned.

        I’ll be polishing the CoC soonish!

        Impressum(german imprint)

        Email: tor@ieji.de

        Admin: @SolSoCoG@ieji.de

        mastd.racing (preview)

        | Users: 33 | Toots: 4,616 | Connections: 281 |

        Mastodon Racing
        Instance dedicated to motorsport.


        Instance dédiée aux sports mécaniques.

        (more)Small instance dedicated to motorsport. Several bot accounts publish news about motorsports. Petite instance dédiée aux sports mécaniques. Plusieurs comptes bot publient les actualités en sports mécaniques.

        The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies: The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

        Excessive advertising Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

        The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

        Racism or advocation of racism Sexism or advocation of sexism Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

        The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

        Sexual depictions of children Content illegal in France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

        Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

        Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person’s demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

        These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user’s access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

        Email: racecontrol@mastd.racing

        Admin: @RaceControl@mastd.racing

        toot.berlin (preview)

        | Users: 476 | Toots: 3,965 | Connections: 878 |

        The Mastodon instance for Berlin. Mastodon is a free, decentralised microblogging platform (think Twitter, but free).

        Provided by the devops nerds at Planio.

        Impressum · Datenschutzerklärung

        (more)This instance is humming nicely on a 6 core, 16 GB RAM KVM VM on a 12 core, 128 GB RAM bare metal hardware node with dual SSDs in a RAID1, hosted at Hetzner in Germany with multiple redundant uplinks on 100% renewable energy sources. We perform offsite backups daily and upgrade to the latest Mastodon version frequently.TL;DR We know what we are doing and your data should be safe. However, since this is a free service, we do not guarantee it.Code of conduct: We value free speech as long as it’s not harming anybody. Just don’t be a jerk.

        Email: jan@toot.berlin

        Admin: @jan@toot.berlin

        (more)Don’t be a dick. Please note: your confirmation email will LIKELY go to spam. Check there.

        Moderation disclaimer:

        Toots made on anitwitter.com will not be moderated in any way. I believe that forcing people to abide to what they can say online is not my business, and people are able to filter the content they don’t want to see.

        That being said, NSFW post flagging is not required.

        HOWEVER

        If you do nothing but harass people mindlessly just to be an edgelord werido I will have zero qualms about investigating why I should keep you on this instance.

        Also don’t post child porn** or something,

        **Lolicon art isn’t child porn.

        mastodon.network (preview)

        | Users: 7,455 | Toots: 57,242 | Connections: 1,724 |

        A social network open to all users.

        (more)This is a free and open Mastodon instance ran by @ian.

        We’re one of the largest and most active Mastodon instances around, and we’re quickly growing as a community. We are also federating with many of the other major instances. If you have questions about how this works or how to create your own instance, feel free to reach out.

        If you see any abusive behavior, please report it. Each report is reviewed personally. Please treat each other with respect.

        This instance is hosted on three servers: Two load balanced web servers and database server. They each have the following specifications: - 4 core Xeon 2.13GHz CPU - 8GB RAM - SSD storage

        Hosting costs are being covered by myself currently. If we need to upgrade servers in the future, I may post a link to help cover costs.

        If you have any questions, feel free to ask.

        Email: hello@mastodon.network

        Admin: Not Available

        mstdn.sanin.link (preview)

        | Users: 7 | Toots: 50 | Connections: 116 |

        さんいんリンク が運営するMastodonインスタンスです。
        山陰地方の公共交通ユーザー、ファンなどの方々向け。鉄道でもバスでもタクシーでも飛行機でもなんでもござれ。

        おねがい

        人物の写った画像は、掲載許可が取れているものを除きモザイク加工などを行って下さい。

        動画、GIFのアップロードはCPU時間がないのでかなりご遠慮下さい
        ゆるりとやりましょう。一杯トゥートするとサーバが疲れます。フォロー・ファボも程々に。

        承認メールが届かない場合はメール等で連絡してくれれば対応します。

        よろしく

        (more) 規約

        迷惑行為はやめてください。面倒なのも勘弁して下さい。 管理人の独断でアカウント凍結やアクセス拒否します。

        当インスタンス内のトゥートに関する権利は、各発信者に存在します。但し、管理人は各発信者の権利を制限することができます。 危険なトゥートを発見した場合は、「通報」機能をつかって知らせて下さい。

        免責

        個人インスタンスです。情報漏えいなどの危険性が高いです。 当インスタンスを使用したことによって生じたいかなる事象に関して、当方は一切責任を負いません。 ご理解の上、ご使用下さい。

        云々

        稼働開始：2017年4月30日

        Email: admin@sanin.link

        Admin: @lynx@mstdn.sanin.link

        meemu.org (preview)

        | Users: 15 | Toots: 359 | Connections: 357 |

        A fluffy mascotted mastodon instance. Join us to worship in the cult of meemu, or if you just want to join a queer/furry friendly mastodon instance. Racist/sexist/homophobic/“loli” content is not welcome on this instance.

        (more)The cult of meemu, here, in the flesh and digital. This instance is intended to be queer friendly and will be moderated with that goal in mind. The following was taken from mastodon.social on April 13th, 2017 and the server will be run in accordance with these guidelines.

        The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

        Excessive advertising Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

        The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

        Racism or advocation of racism Sexism or advocation of sexism Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

        The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

        Sexual depictions of children Content illegal in the United States of America, where this instance resides Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

        Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

        Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person’s demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

        Email: Not Available

        Admin: @meemu@meemu.org

        mastodon.art (preview)

        | Users: 232 | Toots: 7,776 | Connections: 790 |

        Mastodon.art — a place for your artwork of all types from visual, musical, peformance or ____. Also, fun banter, commentary & cited fair-use posts/art/reviews of others' art too. Welcome to y(our) free & open source decentralized life.

        (more)Mastodon.ART General Information Mastodon.ART is a separate & independent instance & is not affiliated with the Mastodon organization. The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of Mastodon.ART; they are here to provide you with an insight into the site & moderation policies:

        Mastodon.ART'ists All content is ⓒ each artist & cannot be distributed or used without prior permission by the respective Mastodon.ART artist. Mastodon.art doesn’t monetize or profit off of your personal information—your information is never for sale. Artists, by using this site you understand that it is not a backup or permanent repository for your information, statuses or media — additionally, your media was downsized on original upload & is not exportable at this time upon transferring to new instance Artists, you may leave and join another instance at any time by exporting your follow list No Brand, name or famous trademark squatting Zero tolerance for harrassment or bullying — your account will be immediately suspended Your admin & moderator is: @Curator We block or suspend other instances that do not adhere to our CoC Thank you for simply enjoying a creative community run by someone supporting The Arts. You may support the community by boosting & positively interacting with everyone. Mastodon.ART has a patreon if you’d like to support the running of YOUR Art community.

        Hosting Information Mastodon.ART uses 5 separate servers & is hosted professionally in Amsterdam on UpCloud & Compose.io in the EU with multiple daily backups

        Mastodon.ART Mastodon Server

        Mastodon.ART provides your amazing toot experience from a UpCloud intel Xeon 4-core with 4GB of ram cloud server.

        Mastodon.ART Mastodon Media

        Mastodon.ART (curate.mastodon.art) media uses a self-hosted medais server utilizing the FOSS opensource MINIO.io code to serve your images from a separate 4-core/4GB ram cloud server with multiple daily automatic backups.

        Mastodon.ART Databases

        2 separate compose.io databases (PostgreSQL & Redis) protect your statuses and timely pushing/retrieving of federated statuses with daily backups

        Mastodon.ART eMail Notifications

        All the emails you receive go through Mailgun’s paid subscription service.

        Federation Policy and Terms of Use Federation serves as a browsing & temporary cached link to cited work here on Mastodon.ART Other instances may not disseminate others' work or toots without credit and proper licensing. Other instances may not use dumb code, machine learning or AI to analyze any derived text or work for publication or profit without Mastodon.ART user consent. This includes serving ads next to copyright content originally submitted on Mastodon.ART Public toots are derived works that are still copyright protected. This instance honors noindex/nofollow and search engines are not allowed to index. Your instance will be blocked/suspended or silenced for willingly allowing any of the content prohibited by this instance

        Mastodon.ART Code of Conduct Guidelines The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of Mastodon.ART; they are here to provide you with an insight into the site & moderation policies:

        All users, local and remote, are expected to adhere to the following interaction principles:

        Posting work of others must be cited (or say artist/author unknown) after searching. Fair Use of copyright applies here. Respect boundaries as placed by others Be respectful/apologize if someone tells you that you cross a boundary accidentally Give people space if you accidentally push past a boundary If you are on either side of this and are worried about the situation escalating, contact the admin or a mod Tag potentially upsetting content such as violence/blood, politics, and other such topics

        All users, local and remote, will be considered in the wrong in a conversation that goes sour if they participate in the following:

        Microaggressions (“not all men”, white/man/cis-splaining, using the wrong pronouns to address someone after being corrected, etc) Demanding education on problematic behavior from a non-admin/moderator Skirting the lines of being a troll Not tagging potentially sensitive replies

        This is not an exhaustive list.  If any of these don't make sense, please speak with an admin or moderator- we are more than happy to help you understand the problems with these kinds of behavior.


The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

        Advertising News bots that do not tag upsetting content Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

        The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

        Racism or advocation of racism Sexism or advocation of sexism Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

        The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

        Sexual depictions of children Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

        Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

        Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person’s demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

        These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user’s access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

        Email: —

        Admin: @Curator@mastodon.art

        ・けんかはやめましょう。いじめ反対！

        Mastodon.direct is an open Mastodon instance welcoming people to discuss a broad range of topics. We strive to provide a high quality instance with reliability, speed, and a responsive moderation team.

        (more)The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

        The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

        Excessive advertising Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

        The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

        Racism or advocation of racism Sexism or advocation of sexism Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

        The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

        Sexual depictions of children Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

        Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

        Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person’s demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

        These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user’s access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law. For abuse or copyright reports, please email abuse at this domain.

        Admin: @djchen@mastodon.direct

        oulipo.social (preview)

        | Users: 738 | Toots: 8,722 | Connections: 482 |

        A Dcntralizd and Fdratd Social Ntwork

        (more)Oulipo.social is a lipogrammatic Mastodon for all. FAQ

        I saw a stray fifth symbol! Can you fix it? Look at our list of bugs on GitHub. It’s probably known, and you shouldn’t toot at @mus about it. If it’s not known, add a bug or a PR on GitHub. Can I post links that contain taboo symbols? Go for it. Validation skips links and it’s not a faux pas at all. What if I post symbols that look similar to that taboo glyph? Don’t. Mods will discard toots that do this, and if you don’t stop, banning may follow. No problm I’ll writ lik this. No. Stop. Don’t do this. But this is hard? Practicing will bring you far. What synonym should I sub in for [x]? Try to stop looking for synonyms; if you try to swap out individual words, you’ll find it tough going. Pull back and think abstractly about what you want to say and find words for that.

        Social Contract This social contract is an adaptation from Mastodon.social. What follows is not a law contract, and final ruling is up to administrators of oulipo.social; it should function to clarify our community policy and standards:

        Posts similar to any of this will not stay up on our activity list:

        Abundant ads Bots that post spam Pornography without a “CW” or “Tricky Topic” tag Horrific or traumatic posts without a “CW” or “Tricky Topic” tag That fifth symbol, or any variant of it, that is found in Latin script, including using “3” or homographic symbols in its spot.

        Posts similar to any of this will not stay up on our activity list, and is possibly grounds for banning:

        Racism or advocation of racism Misogyny or advocation of misogyny Discrimination against LGBT minority groups or individuals, or advocation of that Jingoism or militant nationalism

        Posts similar to any of this will not stay up and is without doubt grounds for banning:

        Child pornography Nazism of any kind or any promoting of National Socialism

        Any conduct which could stalk or harass participants or individuals, or stop individuals from participating in this community, or to impact usability and functionality of this community, or to harass anybody, or advocations that accounts do such actions, is not okay, and is grounds for banning any violators. This is activity such as:

        Continuing to talk to an individual that has said to stop, a platform’s privacy tools notwithstanding. Posting, and/or sharing an individual’s data or information without that individual’s approval (informally known as doxing or dropping dox). Inciting accounts to post to an individual in additional discussion if that individual has said it should stop (informally known brigading or dogpiling).

        All this notwithstanding, administrators of oulipo.social can ban any accounts, at any point, for any motivation, if not in violation of law.

        Email: mousereeve@riseup.net

        Admin: @mus@oulipo.social

        hamtter.net (preview)

        | Users: 44 | Toots: 763 | Connections: 69 |

        hamtter.netへようこそ。
        アマチュア無線家のためのMastodonインスタンスです。
        ※フリーライセンスラジオやBCL/SWLは扱いません。
        登録時のユーザー名は必ずご自身に割り当てられているアマチュア無線のコールサインを半角英数大文字で指定してください。
        例) JA1QRZ 7K4QTH 等
        アマチュア無線を楽しんでいることの確認のため、登録用メールアドレスは文末のいずれかのドメイン名のみ受け付けます。
        本登録に必要な電子メールが送信されますので、事前に正しく転送されるか確認後に登録作業を行って下さい。
        @jarl.com @arrl.net

        Internet Explorerは使えません。
        他のブラウザを使って下さい。
        For Amateur Radio Operator.
        Notice:NO CB Radio or BCL/SWL.
        Username or screen name Must set your Amateur Radio Callsign(Upper Case).
        example) W0QRZ KA1QTH etc.
        Valid mail address,below domains ONLY.
        @jarl.com @arrl.net

        Mastdon NOT SUPPORT Internet Explorer.

        (more)Username or screen name Must set your Amateur Radio Callsign(Upper Case). ユーザー名にアマチュア無線のコールサインを設定し忘れた方は、ユーザー設定にて表示名に半角英数大文字で入れて下さい。 NO WARRANTY AS-IS. このインスタンスは極力安定稼働へ努力をいたしますが、個人で運営しているため、動作は無保証、あるがままです。

        他インスタンスからリモートフォローをしてきたユーザは必ずしもアマチュア無線家とは限りません。 迷惑だと感じた場合はブロックを推奨します。

        参加することによる金銭的な損失、個人情報などの毀損については一切関知しません。

        Email: je4smq@jarl.com

        Admin: @JE4SMQ@hamtter.net

        Copyright © 2010 - 2017 SQUARE ENIX CO., LTD. All Rights Reserved.
        記載されている会社名・製品名・システム名などは、各社の商標、または登録商標です。

        (more)免責事項

        このインスタンスは予告なくメンテナンスを行うことがあります。 インスタンス内でのトラブルの責任を管理者が取ることは出来ません。

        ルール

        連投や，フォロ爆などの過度に迷惑がかかる投稿は禁止です。スパムにしか見えないような宣伝も禁止します。 著作権を侵害するコンテンツは、著作者の申し立てに応じて削除いたします。

        禁止行為

        公序良俗に反する行為 日本国内の法律に違反する行為 他者に中傷・脅迫・経済的もしくは精神的に損害や不利益を与える行為 サーバに極端な負荷をかける行為

        torontomusic.cloud (preview)

        | Users: 53 | Toots: 236 | Connections: 295 |

        A social network for Toronto music folks: artists, bands, presenters, independent media, concertgoers, collaborators, DJs, producers, music sharers, venues, indie record labels, and whoever else wants to join. There are no ads, and no algorithms. All your followers will see your posts here, and you won’t miss any posts by your favourite people.

        Mastodon is a new open-source Twitter alternative that’s a bit popular in Japan and France. It’s a bit basic compared with established social networks, but it’s brand-new. There’s a community of volunteer developers working on it and it’s getting better every day.

        For now, torontomusic.cloud will use the policies of the main English-language Mastodon network, mastodon.social. In the future these will be determined by the users of torontomusic.cloud, but many of them seem unlikely to change.

      • The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
        1. Racism or advocation of racism
        2. Sexism or advocation of sexism
        3. Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
        4. Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

      • The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
        1. Sexual depictions of children
        2. Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
        3. Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

        1. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
          1. Excessive promotion
          2. Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content
          3. Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

        2. Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
          1. Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
          2. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person’s demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
          3. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

        (more) Contact

        Business e-mail:

        Email: Not Available

        Admin: Not Available

        md.ggtea.org (preview)

        | Users: 4 | Toots: 1,270 | Connections: 583 |

        ggtea.orgの人のほぼ個人用インスタンスです

        サービスの継続性その他は管理人が管理出来る範囲で処理されます

        禁止事項など

        • 警察や、裁判所からの手紙、内容証明郵便が来るような行為
        • 管理人の許可しないBotの運用
        • 自動化された大量フォロー、大量ポストなどのサーバに負荷がかかる行為

        注意事項など

        • 基本的に人の活動に対応するアカウントを想定しています。
        • 宣伝ほかについては迷惑になりそうな場合何らかの対処をする可能性はあります。
        • 無人っぽいアカウントも消す可能性があります。
        • サーバのメンテナンスについては随時行なう可能性があります。できるだけ起こらないようにしますがメンテナンスの結果データが消える可能性は当然あります。
        • 負荷増大の結果家鯖で処理出来無くなった場合サービスを止めるなどをする可能性はあります。
        • 家鯖の回線の不調、家鯖の不調、家鯖の構成変更ほかによりサービスの可用性に問題が発生する可能性があります。
        • サーバ内の比較的古い過去の画像などのデータに関しては消していく可能性が高いです。
        • その他想定外の事象に対しては常識的に考えられる方向にベストエフォートで対応されます。

        (more) 連絡先

        神楽坂しえる @Clworld

        ビジネスメールアドレス: clworld@ggtea.org

        Email: clworld@ggtea.org

        Admin: @Clworld@md.ggtea.org

        kitty.town (preview)

        | Users: 86 | Toots: 5,362 | Connections: 489 |

        Kitty.Town is a small Mastodon instance for kind people. We are a creator-friendly community and residents are free to post about their work and ask for support as long as it stays within our Code of Conduct.

        Your choice of instance is an important one and we ask that you think on it carefully before making a decision.

        Please read over the Code of Conduct (located on the Extended Information page) before signing up.

        If our rules do not suit your needs, there are many instances to choose from here: instances.mastodon.xyz

        Thank you!

        You can help support Kitty.Town on Patreon, via Paypal, or by bitcoin donation (bitcoin:18ocF6gao55WNsTaFrrKKU1A4ax7xNM42m).

        You can find Kitty.Town items for sale in our shop.

        Follow @Katya (our town mascot) for updates and support for Kitty.Town.

        List of blocked domains.

        Kitty.Town logo/art by Reimena Yee

        (more) As a resident (user) of Kitty.Town, you agree to uphold an environment of respect and empathy for all users.

        Any conduct that is deemed oppressive is grounds for removal from Kitty.Town. Any language or action that expresses, reinforces, upholds or sympathizes with any form of systemic social domination is considered oppressive and is grounds for removal at any level deemed appropriate by the Mayor (Admin).

        Pornography, violence, and fast-blinking images/content should not be used as a profile photo and should always be posted with a “NSFW” tag/content warning.

        The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in a ban from Kitty.Town:

        •Unapproved bots (for approval, please contact the Mayor) •Plagiarism (see definition) •Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content •Untagged gore and graphic violence •Racism or advocation of racism •Sexism or advocation of sexism •Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof •Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

        The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in a ban from Kitty.Town:

        •Sexual depictions of children •Holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism •Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism •Promoting the oppression of any group based on gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, or nationality.

        Any conduct intended to stalk, harass, or intimidate other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions is forbidden and subject to punishment up to and including a ban from Kitty.Town.

        This can include, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

        •Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed. •Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person’s demographic, personal, or private data without express permission. •Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment. •Posting and/or disseminating a person’s posts (“toots”), including screen captures or any other content without express permission. •Intentionally posting or disseminating libel, slander, or other disinformation.

        This Code of Conduct applies both to content on Kitty.Town and to public spaces when an individual is representing Kitty.Town or its community.

        Reports of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be made by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and dealt with as soon as possible. Admins are obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

        The Mayor (Admin) reserves the right to revoke any user’s content on or access to Kitty.Town, at any time, for any reason.

        Email: kittytownmail@gmail.com

        Admin: @GinnyMcQueen@kitty.town

        masto.nine-hells.net (preview)

        | Users: 31 | Toots: 260 | Connections: 522 |

        Welcome to masto.nine-hells.net!
        Please enjoy your time here but be sure to adhere to the code of conduct.

        todon.nl (preview)

        | Users: 25 | Toots: 1,510 | Connections: 428 |

        Todon.nl is a Mastodon instance for progressive people. Although we are located in the Netherlands, we like to welcome every progressive person from all over the world.
        So if you are (for example) a leftist, socialist, anarchist, Marxist, ecologist, green, vegan, open-minded, anti-racist, pirate, social democrat or social liberal, please join us!


        Todon.nl is een Mastodon-server voor progressieve mensen. Ondanks dat wij ons in Nederland bevinden, willen wij elk progressief persoon van over de hele wereld welkom heten.
        Dus ben je (bijvoorbeeld) links, socialist, anarchist, ecologisch, groen, vegan, ruimdenkend, antiracist, piraat, sociaaldemocraat of sociaalliberaal, meld je dan aan!


        (more)(Nederlands onderaan) These Terms of Service are only valid for Todon.nl. See also Mastodon’s (more general) Terms of Service. However, the terms on this page are leading. If you can’t agree with the conditions below, you can still use Mastodon, but you should use another instance with different conditions. Or you can deploy your own instance, where you can set your own terms.

        After you sign up, you have to verify your email address. Check your spam folder if you didn’t receive a verification email. If after a while an account has 0 toots (posts), follows no one and/or has not set an avatar, we consider this account a ghost account, and will probably suspend it.

        We have to adhere to Dutch and European law. Leading for us however is the Universal Declaration of Human Rights. You are personally fully responsible and accountable for what you publish on Todon.nl. Without any exception, whether you use a pseudonym/alias or not. In other words: we from Todon.nl and the Mastodon Project in general are completely not responsible and accountable for what you publish, in any form whatsoever. We do not tolerate, among other things, racism, homophobia, transphobia and other forms of discrimination, no (sexual) abuse of minors and adults, no calls to and glorification of violence, no right wing and religious extremism, no harassment, and of course no spam. We always keep the right to silence or suspend your account. We are fortunately very tolerant, and freedom of speech and expression are highly valued by us, and therefore we will always think twice before we take these actions. Please use the report tool if you think someone on this instance did not comply with our guidelines.

        Copyright

        Everything you toot is yours and stays yours. You are free to release your toots under any kind of license. We advise you to use a Creative Commons license. You can put this in short in your bio. When you don’t indicate a license, the Dutch copyright Law applies. Work from others is of course not your work and using that is completely your risk. So keep yourself well informed about the copyright of third party content. Usually more flexible conditions apply for embedded content and citations.

        Warranty

        Todon.nl and the Mastodon project cannot, in any way be held liable for damages and harm. Todon.nl and the Mastodon Project work hard to prevent fatal server and software failures, but we can never ever guarantee this.

        The text above can be modified by us. Check therefore regularly if you still agree with these terms.

        Deze gebruikersvoorwaarden gelden alleen voor Todon.nl. Zie ook Mastodons (meer algemene) gebruikersvoorwaarden (Engels). De voorwaarden op deze pagina zijn echter leidend. Als je niet akkoord kan of wil gaan met onderstaande voorwaarden, dan kan je nog steeds gebruik maken van Mastodon, maar dan wel op een andere Mastodon-server met andere voorwaarden. Of je kan je eigen Mastodon-server installeren, waar jezelf de voorwaarden mag bepalen.

        Nadat je je hebt registreert, moet je eerste jouw e-mail verifiëren. Kijk in je spambox wanneer je geen verificatiemail hebt ontvangen. Wanneer blijkt dat na een tijdje een account 0 toots (berichten) heeft, niemand volgt en/of geen avatar heeft ingesteld, beschouwen we dit account als een spookaccount en zullen we het waarschijnlijk blokkeren. Wij moeten ons aan de Nederlandse en Europese wet houden. Leidend voor ons is echter de Universele verklaring van de rechten van de mens. Jij persoonlijk bent volledig verantwoordelijk en aansprakelijk voor wat jij op Todon.nl plaatst. Zonder enkele uitzondering en of je nu een pseudoniem/alias gebruikt of niet. In andere woorden: wij van Todon.nl en van het Mastodon-project in zijn geheel zijn niet verantwoordelijk en aansprakelijk voor wat jij hier publiceert in welke vorm dan ook. Wij tolereren onder andere geen racisme, seksisme, homofobie, transfobie, en andere vormen van discriminatie, geen (seksueel) misbruik van minder- en meerderjarigen, oproep tot en verheerlijking van geweld, geen rechts- en religieus extremisme, niet het lastig vallen van mensen, en uiteraard geen spam. Wij houden ten allen tijde het recht om jouw account het zwijgen op te leggen of te blokkeren. We zijn gelukkig heel tolerant en hebben de vrijheid van meningsuiting hoog in het vaandel staan, en denken daarom altijd twee keer na voordat we daartoe overgaan. Gebruik de rapporteerfunctie wanneer jij denkt dat iemand op deze Mastodon-server zich niet aan onze richtlijnen houdt.

        Auteursrecht

        Alles wat jij toot is van jou en blijft van jou. Je bent vrij om jouw toots onder elke soort licentie vrij te geven. Wij adviseren om een Creative Commons-licentie te gebruiken. Dit kan je dan het beste in het kort in jouw bio kenbaar maken. Wanneer je geen licentie kenbaar maakt dan geldt de Nederlandse auteurswet, wat inhoudt dat alle rechten bij jou liggen. Werk van anderen valt uiteraard niet onder jouw auteursrecht en het gebruik daarvan is volledig jouw risico. Stel je dus goed op de hoogte van het auteursrecht op werk van derden. Voor ingesloten inhoud (embedded content) en citaten gelden meestal soepelere voorwaarden.

        Garantie Todon.nl en het Mastodon-project kunnen op geen enkele manier aansprakelijk worden gesteld voor geleden schade. Todon.nl en het Mastodon-project doen hard hun best om fatale server- en software-problemen te voorkomen, maar we kunnen dit nooit ofte nimmer garanderen.

        Bovenstaande tekst kan door ons aangepast worden. Controleer daarom regelmatig of je je nog in bovenstaande voorwaarden kunt vinden.

        Email: admin@todon.nl

        Admin: @admin@todon.nl

        astdn.tokyo (preview)

        | Users: 13 | Toots: 562 | Connections: 359 |

        個人運営の小規模過疎なMastodonインスタンスです。
        何かに特化したインスタンスではありませんが、こじんまりと雑談などができれば嬉しいです。
        ご興味ある方はお気軽にご登録ください。

        (more)お願い

        日本国内の法律は遵守してください。犯罪行為への加担や日本法に違反するトゥートは禁止します。お守りいただけない場合には、公的機関から開示請求に応じてログを開示することもあります。 エログロなどの理由で18禁になりそうな文章にはContent Warningを付与しておきましょう。例え付けていても日本法に抵触するような画像はダメですが。 スパムにしか見えないような宣伝行為やBotを使ってサーバに負荷を与える行為はお控えください。 過疎を楽しむポイント

        見るべきタイムラインは連合タイムライン。ローカルタイムラインは見ても寂しいので気にしない。 楽しむためにはリモートフォロー大事。ただ、気持ちのこもらない無差別フォローはダメだと思う。

        Email: is@astdn.tokyo

        Admin: @asumy@astdn.tokyo

        himastdon.club (preview)

        | Users: 45 | Toots: 2,837 | Connections: 313 |


        himastdon.club(ひまストドン)は
        ひまわりストリーム ( http://himast.in/ ) の名を借りた、
        非公認Mastodonサーバーです。
        (※ひまスト管理人さんに知られちゃいましたが、非公認です！)

        基本的には、ひまわりストリームにて
        配信・視聴を行っている方向けのインスタンスです。
        名前一緒にする必要もないですし、
        匿名勢だけど……といった方もウェルカム
        また、過疎インスタンスへの興味があるというのも構いません(´∀｀)
        規約等は詳細説明をどうぞ。


        メールアドレスは捨てアドでもいいですが、
        パスワード再設定出来なくなるので、要注意♡

        (more)もしも以下の条件に当てはまった場合、このサーバーは停止されます。

        ・ひまわりストリーム管理者より通告があった場合 ・himastdon.club管理者( @wanwan@himastdon.club )の都合 ・2017/04/22より一年経過後に、アクティブなアカウントが少ない場合

        その他は概ね、他のインスタンスの一般的なルールに則ります。 エログロに関わる発言には、Content Warning エロ画像は、NSFWタグを付けること。 通報に関しましては@wanwanへDMか、 ビジネスメールアドレス欄宛に、連絡をお願いいたします

        業者、BOTはお断り♡

        完全に趣味、技術的興味で立てているインスタンスなので 最悪の場合データ消滅も有り得ます。 その際は、ゆるして♡

        急にメンテナンスすることもあります♡

        Email: wanwan@himastdon.club

        Admin: @wanwan@himastdon.club

        techn.ical.ist (preview)

        | Users: 107 | Toots: 1,202 | Connections: 895 |

        This Mastodon instance focuses on programming and computer science related topics.

        (more)

        Code of Conduct

        click to read> This Code of Conduct is adapted from the Contributor Covenant, version 1.4, available at http://contributor-covenant.org/version/¼.

        Our Pledge In the interest of fostering an open and welcoming environment, we as contributors and maintainers pledge to making participation in our project and our community a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of age, body size, disability, ethnicity, gender identity and expression, level of experience, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, or sexual identity and orientation. Our Standards Examples of behavior that contributes to creating a positive environment include:

        Using welcoming and inclusive language Being respectful of differing viewpoints and experiences Gracefully accepting constructive criticism Focusing on what is best for the community Showing empathy towards other community members

        Examples of unacceptable behavior by participants include:

        The use of sexualized language or imagery and unwelcome sexual attention or advances Trolling, insulting/derogatory comments, and personal or political attacks Public or private harassment Publishing others' private information, such as a physical or electronic address, without explicit permission Other conduct which could reasonably be considered inappropriate in a professional setting

        Our Responsibilities Project maintainers are responsible for clarifying the standards of acceptable behavior and are expected to take appropriate and fair corrective action in response to any instances of unacceptable behavior. Project maintainers have the right and responsibility to remove, edit, or reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, and other contributions that are not aligned to this Code of Conduct, or to ban temporarily or permanently any contributor for other behaviors that they deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, or harmful. Scope This Code of Conduct applies both within project spaces and in public spaces when an individual is representing the project or its community. Examples of representing a project or community include using an official project e-mail address, posting via an official social media account, or acting as an appointed representative at an online or offline event. Representation of a project may be further defined and clarified by project maintainers. Enforcement Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be reported by contacting the project team at contact@draft.li. All complaints will be reviewed and investigated and will result in a response that is deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances. The project team is obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident. Further details of specific enforcement policies may be posted separately. Project maintainers who do not follow or enforce the Code of Conduct in good faith may face temporary or permanent repercussions as determined by other members of the project’s leadership.

        Email: contact@draft.li

        Admin: @vhf@techn.ical.ist

        mastodont.cat (preview)

        | Users: 46 | Toots: 999 | Connections: 296 |

        mastodont.cat és una instància de Mastodon en català, per la comunitat de llengua i cultura catalana d'arreu d'internet.

        Quines són les normes ?

        - Està prohibida qualsevol mostra de racisme, xenofòbia o homofòbia

        - No es permès fer spam

        - La publicitat excessiva serà esborrada

        (more)Mastodon és una xarxa social basada en GNU Social. Mastodont és “Mastodon” en català. mastodont.cat és la única instància de tot el “fediverse” de Mastodon que té les opcions i menús en català (client web).

        computerfairi.es (preview)

        | Users: 114 | Toots: 9,922 | Connections: 646 |

        Computer Fairies is a Mastodon instance that aims to be as queer, friendly and furry as possible. We welcome all kinds of computer fairies!
        We are very new at this, so please bear with us!
        Mascot art by @blackle

        (more)Guidelines:

        We (the admins) will not tolerate any sort of discrimination Basically, don’t be a jerk and you’ll be ok We reserve the right to remove anyone from this instance for being a jerk at our discretion, after fair warning depending on the case.

        table { color: #fac; }

        th { font-weight: bold; }

        th, td { padding: 3px; }

        tr:nth-child(even) { background: #ffaacc33; }

        Blocked Instances All blocked instances have media blocks regardless of block type. GNU Social instances are blocked due to a majority of them openly harrassing people, associations with 4chan, and incompatibilities with Mastodon’s post privacy settings. Last updated 08/05/2017

        Domain Block Reason

        social.heldscal.la Suspend GNU Social instance, harrassment

        sealion.club Suspend GNU Social instance

        gs.kawa-kun.com Suspend GNU Social instance

        pawoo.net Silence Lolicon

        anitwitter.com Silence Lolicon

        rainbowdash.net Suspend GNU Social instance, harrassment

        freezepeach.xyz Suspend GNU Social instance, harrassment

        woofer.alfter.us Suspend GNU Social instance, harrassment under guise of “free speech”

        social.au2pb.net Suspend GNU Social instance

        gorf.club Suspend GNU Social instance

        gs.smuglo.li Suspend GNU Social instance, lolicon

        unsafe.space Suspend GNU Social instance, harrassment

        wrongthink.net Suspend Harrassment under the guise of “free speech”

        noagendasocial.com Suspend Harrassment under the guise of “free speech”

        maly.io Silence Harrassment under the guise of “free speech” (suspected)

        ediot.social Suspend Harrassment, Encyclopedia Dramatica

        memetastic.space Suspend Harrassment

        shitposter.club Suspend GNU Social instance, harrassment

        social.tchncs.de Suspend Admin’s complacency with harrassment

        gs.archae.me Suspend GNU Social instance, boosts from shitposter.club and freezepeach.xyz

        Email: faye@computerfairi.es
